ref segment: Cuando terminemos aquí, la llevaremos a la cárcel del condado en Kingston para procesarla.
src segment: Well, when we're done here, we'll be moving you to county jail in Kingston for booking.

ref segment: La llevaremos a la cárcel del condado.
src segment: We have to take you to county now.

ref segment: - El Sr. Grey la verá ahora. - Eso no gracioso.
src segment: Mr. Grey will see you now.

ref segment: Siempre la ignoraran.
src segment: They'll always ignore you.

ref segment: De ahí la conozco, ¿no? Salió en televisión.
src segment: Hey, that's where I know you from, right?

ref segment: Hace poco se ha casado con un hombre de disposición amable al parecer, que nunca la ha abandonado... por un despreciable acompañante de dudosa moral.
src segment: You have recently married a man of a seemingly kindly disposition, who has now abandoned you for an unsavoury companion of dubious morals.

ref segment: Tengo algo que la ayudará.
src segment: Oh, I've got something to, um, help you along.

ref segment: De acuerdo, le diré que la espere.
src segment: Okay, so I'll tell him to expect you.

ref segment: No la había visto.
src segment: I didn't see you there.

ref segment: Señorita Waters, el Dr. Hawkins la verá ahora.
src segment: Miss Waters, Dr. Hawkins will see you now.

ref segment: - Sra. Parks, lamento si la ofendí
src segment: - Ms. parks, I'm sorry if I've offended you.

ref segment: Ahora la recuerdo, sí.
src segment: I remember you now, yes.

ref segment: Su carruaje la espera.
src segment: Your carriage awaits you.

ref segment: Le garantizo que la va a mantener despierta toda la noche con sus ronquidos.
src segment: I guarantee he will keep you awake all night with his snoring.

ref segment: Sí, la enviaremos con el director porque no cierra la boca.
src segment: Okay, we'll send you to the Principal's office 'cause you can't keep your mouth shut.

ref segment: Yo la protegeré.
src segment: I'm gonna get you through this.

ref segment: Me temo que la confundimos con una espía nazi.
src segment: I fear we mistook you for a Nazi spy.

ref segment: El problema es, que él la ama.
src segment: Trouble is, he loves you.

ref segment: Christelle la contactará, como está previsto, en septiembre para definir la maqueta.
src segment: Christelle will contact you in September to finalize the layout.

ref segment: Dios la vendiga hermana, y a él.
src segment: God bless you, Sister. And him.

ref segment: Creo que no la he visto antes por aquí.
src segment: I don't believe I've seen you here before?

ref segment: La verdad es que la envidio bastante.
src segment: You know I rather envy you.

ref segment: Estoy segura que su amigo la puede ayudar.
src segment: I'm sure your gentleman friend will help you out.

ref segment: Creo que debería pedirle a la hermana Julienne. Que la retire de sus deberes de partera hasta que sepamos.
src segment: I think you should ask Sister Julienne to take you off other midwifery duties until we know what this is.

ref segment: No la esperaba.
src segment: I wasn't expecting you.

ref segment: El capitán dijo que la escoltara hasta Bellmont, antes de reunirme con él.
src segment: Captain has said I was to escort you to Bellmont before we rejoin him.

ref segment: Algo llegó volando, y yo la quité del medio.
src segment: Something came flying at the building, and I got you out of the way.

ref segment: No pasa a menudo que un preso la deje muda.
src segment: It's not often I see a prisoner leave you speechless.

ref segment: Quizá la haya arrastrado a esta basura involuntariamente.
src segment: And I may have dragged you into this bullshit unintentionally.

ref segment: Antes de que este lugar la convierta en sal.
src segment: Before this place turns you to salt.

ref segment: Yo la representaré.
src segment: I'm representing you now.

ref segment: ¿Con qué la presionan?
src segment: What do they have on you, huh?

ref segment: Luke la ayudó.
src segment: Luke helped you.

ref segment: ¿Qué la afectó?
src segment: What shook you?

ref segment: ¿Qué la llevó a arruinar su carrera?
src segment: What pushed you towards career suicide?

ref segment: Luego estuvo a solas con Temple, ella la insultó, y usted perdió el control. Y lo sabe.
src segment: Then you're in a room alone with Miss Temple, and she insults you, and you lost control... and you know it.

ref segment: Te la cambio por la L6.
src segment: I'll trade you for the L6.

ref segment: La vecina con la que la engañó también ha declarado.
src segment: The neighbour with whom he cheated on you also came forward.

ref segment: ¿Eso fue antes que Roy la sacara a escondidas de la isla?
src segment: Is that before Roy smuggled you off the island?

ref segment: Deja que la ayude.
src segment: Let me help you.

ref segment: ¿La está amenazando?
src segment: Is he threatening you?

ref segment: Me refiero a antes de que la aburriera con la guerra.
src segment: - I mean before I bored you with war.

ref segment: Parece ser que la he subestimado, jovencita.
src segment: It appears I've underestimated you, young lady.

ref segment: Andy la recibirá ahora.
src segment: (footsteps) Woman: Andy is ready to see you now.

ref segment: Cuando recibí tu carta, la tomé por una invitación para venir a verte.
src segment: When I got your letter, I assumed it was an invitation to come and see you.

ref segment: Y a pesar de mi silencio, te la acabé contagiando como si fuera un virus.
src segment: And despite my silence, I ended up infecting you as if it were a virus.

ref segment: Madre, deje que ella la examine.
src segment: Mother, let her examine you.

ref segment: No se supone que sea lindo. Si eso le dijeron, la engañaron.
src segment: And if someone told you it would, they misled you.

ref segment: ¿Qué la llevó a creer que se estaban exportando armas británicas bajo cuerda a través de TradePass?
src segment: What led you to believe that British arms were being exported under the counter through TradePass?

ref segment: -Porque va a llegar el "empereur", si no, la mandaba fusilar junto a los tres prisioneros.
src segment: - If the "empereur" weren't arriving I would send you to the firing squad with the other prisioners.

ref segment: Usted estaba para él, a su disposición, y él la traicionó.
src segment: You were there for him, at his beck and call, and he betrayed you.

ref segment: Esto la curará.
src segment: That will cure you.

ref segment: Porque la respecto mucho.
src segment: Because I respect you so much.

ref segment: Él la necesita más que yo.
src segment: He needs you now more than I.

ref segment: Su padre la nombró fideicomisaria.
src segment: Your father listed you as his trustee.

ref segment: Pero es una buena noticia, te la diré allá con una bebida en la mano.
src segment: But it's good news, so I'm telling you at the bar with a drink in my hand.

ref segment: Ellos la ayudarán.
src segment: They'll help you.

ref segment: Pero si usted cree que no comparte ninguna responsabilidad en los acontecimientos que la trajeron A esta sala de tribunal, usted está equivocada.
src segment: But if you believe you share no responsibility in the events that brought you to this courtroom, you are mistaken.

ref segment: Él la asustó.
src segment: He freaked you out

ref segment: No la esperaba tan pronto.
src segment: I didn't expect you so soon.

ref segment: Para que quede claro, yo la busqué.
src segment: I'll make it clear. I came to you.

ref segment: Recibí una copia del affidávit que mandó al Comité Jurídico... diciendo que Clarence Thomas la acosó sexualmente.
src segment: I received a copy of the affidavit that you faxed the Judiciary Committee stating that Clarence Thomas sexually harassed you.

ref segment: Tengo un gran staff... que la ayudará con todo.
src segment: I got a great young staff, who are gonna help you out with everything.

ref segment: ¿Son amigos o familia que la apoya el día de hoy?
src segment: You've got friends or family joining you here today?

ref segment: Entiendo que esa chica la está persiguiendo.
src segment: I understand that girl haunting you.

ref segment: La llamé porque podríamos haber encontrado el nombre de la chica.
src segment: I called you because we may have found the girl's name.

ref segment: La asignamos a otro lugar.
src segment: So, we've assigned you somewhere else.

ref segment: Por favor, al menos hasta que vuelva el Sr. Stark, déjeme que la lleve.
src segment: Please, at least until Mr. Stark returns, allow me to drive you around.

ref segment: "Señora, ¿sabe por qué la paré?"
src segment: "Ma'am, do you know why I pulled you over?"

ref segment: - Te la he pegado.
src segment: - So had you. - For a second.

ref segment: Solo porque yo la detuve.
src segment: Only because I stopped you.

ref segment: Me preguntó si la había buscado.
src segment: You asked me if I even looked for you.

ref segment: Srta. Groves, luego la llamo.
src segment: Miss Groves, I'll get back to you.

ref segment: Después del 11 de septiembre, el gobierno quería un sistema que observara todo y a todos, y si tengo razón, alguien construyó la puñetera cosa, por eso la he llamado.
src segment: After 9/11, the government wanted a system that could watch everyone and everything, and if I'm right, then somebody really built the damn thing, which is why I called you.

ref segment: Concéntrese en el chico que canta como un ángel, pero que no la necesita.
src segment: Focus on the kid who sings like an angel even though he doesn't need you.

ref segment: ¿Cómo la convencieron de hacer eso?
src segment: How exactly did they rope you into doing that?

ref segment: El día que la llamó y usted se negó a ayudar.
src segment: The day he called you and you refused to help.

ref segment: Déjeme que la lleve.
src segment: Allow me to drive you around.

ref segment: ¿La ha capturado con su patentada tortuga de furia?
src segment: Did he catch you with his patented tortoise of fury?

ref segment: Jack Thompson la tiene en alta consideración.
src segment: Jack Thompson thinks very highly of you.

ref segment: Sí, sí, la mantendré al tanto.
src segment: Yes, yes, I will keep you updated.

ref segment: Te la di para que la cuides.
src segment: - I gave it to you to look after!

ref segment: Y ¿le importaría invitar a su amigo... que la siguió hasta aquí a que se nos una, señorita Wyatt?
src segment: And would you mind inviting your friend who followed you here to join us, Ms. Wyatt?

ref segment: Lowry la llamó anoche.
src segment: Lowry called you last night.

ref segment: Creo que si te la mando a la prisión por correo, será más fácil que conseguir que papá la firme.
src segment: I think if I mail it to you at the prison it's still easier than getting it from Dad.

ref segment: Sí, señora Simpson, he conseguido que la suelten debido a un tecnicismo.
src segment: Yes, Mrs. Simpson, I got you off on a technicality.

ref segment: Sí, y cuando la necesitemos, la vamos a contactar.
src segment: If and when we need you, we'll contact you.

ref segment: Me escribió desde aquí una vez y me contó lo mucho que la admiraba.
src segment: She wrote me from here once and told me how much she admired you.

ref segment: Pero entonces piensa que los hombres que la miran son unos necios o algo peor, por caer en un espectáculo tan evidentemente superficial.
src segment: But then you think the men who look at you are fools, or worse, to be taken in by such an obvious outward show.

ref segment: Según esto, él la llamó seis veces en dos días.
src segment: Only, according to this... he called you six times in two days.

ref segment: La llevaremos de nuevo a la Casa Blanca.
src segment: We're taking you back to the White House.

ref segment: ¿Y quién la invitó a ese servicio?
src segment: Mm-hmm. And who was it that invited you to that service?

ref segment: ¿Y la señorita Wesley la asesoró psicológicamente?
src segment: And did Ms. Wesley refer you to any kind of psychological counseling?

ref segment: Cuando la vi en la exposición, pensé en ella.
src segment: When I saw you at the lecture, I thought of her.

ref segment: Según los registros, el Dr. Banning la trató con hidroterapia y drogas psicotrópicas.
src segment: According to the records, Dr. Banning attempted to treat you with hydrotherapy and psychotropic drugs.

ref segment: Lo siento, ¿este hombre la está molestando?
src segment: Sorry, is this man bothering you?

ref segment: Alguien la ha estado vigilando.
src segment: Someone's been watching you.

ref segment: Por eso la eligieron para dar esta noticia.
src segment: That's why they chose you to break the story.

ref segment: Alguien del ayuntamiento la llamó con la noticia, ¿verdad?
src segment: Someone at City Hall rang you with the story, yes?

ref segment: Ella la admira mucho y, cada vez que la ve, se paraliza.
src segment: She's a fan and whenever she sees you, she freaks out.

ref segment: Y por lo que dice, la conozco desde hace mucho tiempo.
src segment: And from what you say, I've known you a long time.

ref segment: No la abandonaré por nada del mundo.
src segment: I'm not leaving you for anything in this world.

ref segment: Y, en cualquier caso, no la abandonaría.
src segment: And I wouldn't leave you in any case.

ref segment: Un día no muy lejano, nadie la tocará cuando no quiera que la toquen.
src segment: One day soon, no one will touch you when you don't want to be touched.

ref segment: Después la atarán a una mesa de operaciones.
src segment: Then they'll strap you to a table.

ref segment: Deje que la ayude.
src segment: Let me help you.

ref segment: La última persona que verá antes de la cirugía será alguien que la ama.
src segment: The last person you see before the surgery will be someone who loves you.

ref segment: Lo cual la sorprendería, si me conociera mejor.
src segment: Which would shock you if you knew me better.

ref segment: Debe rodearse de aquellos a quienes les importa. Quienes la defenderían.
src segment: You must surround yourself with people, with those who care for you, those who would defend you.

ref segment: Sus manos la están delatando, casi, doctora.
src segment: Your hands give you away, almost, Doctor.

ref segment: Pienso creo que usted debería amarse, tanto como él la ama.
src segment: I think... ..that you should love yourself, as much as He loves you.

ref segment: Querida, la cámara la ama.
src segment: Darling, the camera loves you.

ref segment: La verdad es, que la necesito ahora más que nunca.
src segment: The truth is, I need you now more than I ever have.

ref segment: Sra. Grant, la he conocido desde hace un tiempo, y no creí que fuera siquiera a enviar esa carta.
src segment: Ms. Grant, I've known you for a while now, and I don't think you were ever going to send that letter.

ref segment: ¿La han tratado bien?
src segment: - Did they treat you well?

ref segment: Srta. Li, ¿la hemos ofendido de algún modo?
src segment: Miss Li, did we offend you somehow?

ref segment: Vi cuando cargó a una de ustedes y la puso en la cama como si no pesara nada.
src segment: I saw him carry one of you and lay you on the bed like you weighed nothing.

ref segment: Bueno, pues ese hombre es el que se la está jugando.
src segment: Well, that man is the one who is making a fool of you.

ref segment: Lo sentimos, no sé cómo ocurrió, pero ahora que la tengo aquí, me pregunto si me podría ayudar.
src segment: Sorry, er, don't know how that happened, but, er... now I've got you here, I wonder if you could help me.

ref segment: Si puedo interrumpirla, estamos recibiendo reportes no confirmados de muchas fuentes de noticias en Internet, y como la tenemos aquí, las fuentes dicen que ha sido diagnosticada y tratada por un mieloma anaplástico, una forma agresiva de cáncer de sangre,
src segment: If I could just interrupt you, we are receiving unconfirmed reports from several Internet news sources, and since we have you here, sources are saying that you've been diagnosed and treated for anaplastic myeloma, an aggressive form of blood cancer,

ref segment: ¿Dónde está el hombre que la visita y le dice qué granjas atacar?
src segment: Where is the man who would visit you and tell you which farms to attack?

ref segment: - Le ordeno que la aborte.
src segment: - I'm ordering you to abort.

ref segment: Perdone que la moleste.
src segment: Sorry to disturb you.

ref segment: Te estoy ordenando abandonar este hospital y ofreciéndote ayuda física si la necesitas.
src segment: I am ordering you to leave this hospital and offering to physically assist you if necessary.

ref segment: Así que la dejaré haciendo su compra.
src segment: So I'll just leave you to your shopping. Oh!

ref segment: Sería irresponsable aconsejarle otra cosa, y ningún médico de reputación la operará nuevamente sin al menos seis meses de terapia intensiva.
src segment: I'd be irresponsible in advising you otherwise, and no reputable physician will operate on you again without at least six months of intensive therapy.

ref segment: Aunque sé que nunca tendría paz de nuevo si la envío a pararse junto a él en la horca.
src segment: Though I know I would never have peace again were I to send you to stand beside him at the gallows.

ref segment: Su madre la crio bien.
src segment: Your mother raised you well.

ref segment: La esperan en el Cuarto Roosevelt.
src segment: Oh, they're waiting for you in the Roosevelt Room, ma'am.

ref segment: No la puedo dejar pasar.
src segment: I can't let you in there.

ref segment: Le pedí a RR. PP. de Salud Pública una entrevista tuya y la negaron.
src segment: You know, I asked Public Health PR for a one-on-one with you and they said no.

ref segment: Va a hacer bolas de masa hervida mientras la cuestiono con flashcards.
src segment: She's gonna make dumplings while I quiz you with flashcards.

ref segment: Eso no es para lo que la contraté.
src segment: That's not exactly why I hired you.

ref segment: Según nuestra inteligencia, la odiaban.
src segment: Our intel suggested they hated you.

ref segment: La he votado dos veces.
src segment: I voted for you twice.

ref segment: Yo quería decirle a la señora que yo la admiro mucho pienso que es una señora muy decente y muy bonita.
src segment: I wanted to tell you... I really admire you, I think you're a very decent and beautiful woman.

ref segment: Porque yo soy una persona educada, pero si no lo fuera, la echaba de aquí ahora.
src segment: Because I'm a well-mannered person, but if I wasn't, I'd kick you out right now.

ref segment: Tengo a un edecán que la acompañará a la salida.
src segment: I'll have an aide escort you out.

ref segment: Si alguien la está amenazando yo puedo ayudar.
src segment: If someone is threatening you, I can help.

ref segment: Estoy segura de que no la culpa.
src segment: I'm sure he doesn't blame you.

ref segment: Pero algún día... y si dijera exactamente cuándo, sería un mentiroso... pero... algún día la luz del Señor la alcanzará.
src segment: But someday... and if I said exactly when, I'd be a liar... but... someday the light of the Lord will reach you.

ref segment: Si ese muchacho sabe lo que es bueno para él, la esperará.
src segment: This ol' boy knows what's good for him, he'll wait for you.

ref segment: Pensé que nunca la volvería a ver.
src segment: I thought I'd never see you again.

ref segment: Lo sé, es si quiere que la acompañen.
src segment: I do. That was just for in case you wanted someone to sit with you.

ref segment: Cada vez que la matábamos allí, el tiempo reiniciaba el día.
src segment: Every time we killed you back there, time reset the day.

ref segment: Hay un paciente para usted en la cama 2, y un tal Paul Weatherly la está llamando otra vez.
src segment: There's a patient for you in bed 2, and a Paul Weatherly is calling for you again.

ref segment: Casi no la reconozco sin sus opiniones.
src segment: I almost didn't recognise you without your axe to grind.

ref segment: Venga, la acompañaré hasta la salida.
src segment: Here, let me walk you out.

ref segment: Es una tarjeta que la ayudará en cualquier situación... dondequiera que esté en Arabia.
src segment: This card will save you in about any situation... anywhere there are Arabs.

ref segment: ¿Quiere que la lleve con ella?
src segment: Would you like me to take you to see her?

ref segment: El Dr. Forbes la atenderá ahora.
src segment: Dr. Forbes will see you now.

ref segment: ¿Alguna vez la he defraudado, Sra. Jenkins?
src segment: Have I ever let you down before, Mrs Jenkins?

ref segment: Solo la he conocido por poco tiempo, señora, pero tengo confianza en que le traerá gran crédito a la monarquía.
src segment: I've only known you a short while, Ma'am, but I'm confident that you will bring great credit to the monarchy.

ref segment: ¿Mamá la envió?
src segment: Mama sent you?

ref segment: Bueno... La razón por la que Drake sugirió que la viera es que soy periodista.
src segment: Well, uh, the reason Drake suggested coming to see you is I'm a reporter.

ref segment: Creo que St. Patrick la utilizó, como ya lo hizo antes.
src segment: I think St. Patrick used you, just like he did before.

ref segment: Cuando St. Patrick la vio, no vio a una futura juez, una futura fiscal general.
src segment: When St. Patrick looked at you, he didn't see a future judge, future Attorney General.

ref segment: Él la invita y se va como un adolescente.
src segment: He invites you over and takes off like a teenager.

ref segment: La llamaremos si la necesitamos.
src segment: We'll summon you if we need you.

ref segment: La acusó de tener un romance.
src segment: He accused you of having an affair.

ref segment: ¿está segura que fue Tosh quien la llamó anoche?
src segment: You sure it was Tosh who phoned you last night?

ref segment: Oiga, ¿este tipo la está molestando?
src segment: Hey, hey, is this guy bothering you?

ref segment: Si la abuchean durante la presentación, bajaré hasta la audiencia, lo patearé en las bolas y lo convertiré en un castrati.
src segment: If they boo you during the performance, I'll go down in the audience and I'll kick him in the balls, you know, and I'll make him a castrati.

ref segment: Y él la recogía en la estación tres veces a la semana?
src segment: And he was picking you up at the station three times a week?

ref segment: No te la estoy jugando.
src segment: I'm not messing with you.

ref segment: Mi compañero la llevará hasta la puerta.
src segment: My colleague will have to drive you out the gate.

ref segment: Señorita Peggy, él la ama.
src segment: Miss Peggy, he loves you.

ref segment: El inspector a quien usted atacó, fue quien la llevó al psiquiatra
src segment: The inspector whom you assaulted, took you to the psychiatrist.

ref segment: La llevaría a la fiesta, pero es de etiqueta.
src segment: I'd take you to the party, but it's black tie.

ref segment: Preparé una gran presentación, quisiera que la vieras, ¿sí?
src segment: I have a big presentation I'd like to show you upstairs, so if you will?

ref segment: Pero usted dijo que la estaba siguiendo en una furgoneta?
src segment: But you say he was following you in a van?

ref segment: Déjeme que la acompañe.
src segment: I'll show you through.

ref segment: Creo que no la felicité por el compromiso de Beatrice.
src segment: I do not believe I've congratulated you on Beatrice's engagement.

ref segment: Janet la llevará e iré para desearle las buenas noches.
src segment: Janet will take you, and I'll be in to say good night.

ref segment: Señora, vamos a llamar a paramédicos para que la lleven a un hospital.
src segment: Step back. Ma'am, we're calling paramedics to take you to a hospital.

ref segment: Bueno, probablemente necesitará uno cuando la arrestemos por asesinato.
src segment: Well, you'll probably need one when we arrest you for murder.

ref segment: Así que sabía que el Sr. Cushing la estaba engañando
src segment: So, you knew that Mr. Cushing was cheating on you.

ref segment: Gene la está usando como coartada.
src segment: Gene is using you as an alibi.

ref segment: Perdón que la moleste.
src segment: Actually, uh, sorry to bother you.

ref segment: Creemos que la está usando para pasar información... a una agencia extranjera.
src segment: We think he may be using you to pass along information to a foreign agency.

ref segment: ¿Señora, la puedo tentar con un delicioso pay caliente y gratis?
src segment: Ma'am, can I tempt you with a free, delicious hot pie?

ref segment: ¿El ayudante del fiscal la ha entrevistado?
src segment: Did the AUSA interview you?

ref segment: ‐ Oh, Dios mío, Kate Pierson, no puedo creer que la esté conociendo en mi cumpleaños.
src segment: ‐ Oh, my God, Kate Pierson, I can't believe I'm meeting you on my birthday.

ref segment: Y es por eso que sus padres la pusieron en Radley.
src segment: And that was why your parents put you in Radley.

ref segment: Y creemos que su esposo la eligió como objetivo por su dinero.
src segment: And we think that your husband targeted you for your money.

ref segment: Siento mucho que los alumnos la hicieran pasar por eso.
src segment: I'm so sorry that the students put you through that.

ref segment: La dejó y usted le destrozó el auto.
src segment: He dumped you, and then you busted up his car.

ref segment: Será el vehículo que usará cuando la arreste por asesinato.
src segment: It's what he's gonna put you in the back of when he arrests you for murder.

ref segment: - ¿Ahora quiere que la apoyemos para ser presidenta solo porque es mujer?
src segment: - Now you want us to support you for president just because you're a woman?

ref segment: ¿Alguien la vio allí?
src segment: Did anyone else see you there?

ref segment: No la culpo por no querer hablar de ello.
src segment: I... I don't blame you for not wanting to talk about it.

ref segment: He leído todos sus archivos, Sra. Crowley, y el problema que tengo es que, durante su juicio, usted nunca declaró que su marido la maltratara.
src segment: I've read all your files, Ms. Crowley, and the problem I'm having is during your trial, you never officially stated that your husband abused you.

ref segment: El informe policial afirma que no había una amenaza inmediata en el momento del asesinato, así que mi pregunta es, si su marido la maltrataba tantas veces, ¿por qué lo mató en lugar de abandonarlo?
src segment: The police report states that there was no imminent threat at the time of the murder, so my question is, if your husband was abusing you so badly, why did you kill him instead of just leaving him?

ref segment: Rodney la crió, ¿verdad?
src segment: Rodney raised you, right?

ref segment: Aportaron información que se la relaciona con los cargos.
src segment: Provided information that ties you to the charges.

ref segment: ¿Él la obligo a la fuerza?
src segment: Did he force you?

ref segment: - ¿Sus amigos la ayudan? - ¡Sí!
src segment: Your friends help you out.

ref segment: Tal vez sea necesario que la registremos
src segment: Maybe we need to search you.

ref segment: Entonces sera mejor que la proteja.
src segment: Then we better keep you safe.

ref segment: Es mejor la última vez que la vio.
src segment: - Same. Looking better than the last time I saw you.

ref segment: Libertus la protegerá de aquí en adelante.
src segment: Libertus will take care of you from here.

ref segment: - ¿El ayuntamiento la apoya?
src segment: - Does City Hall support you?

ref segment: No la he oído llegar.
src segment: I didn't hear you...

ref segment: No la necesito, ni a su estúpida táctica prohibida.
src segment: I don't need you or your stupid forbidden move.

ref segment: Aquí dice que usted se separó de su esposo luego de que la golpeara en la cara con un elemento contundente.
src segment: It says here that you separated from your husband after he struck you in the face with a jack handle.

ref segment: Fue su esposo quien la golpeó.
src segment: This is your husband who beat you.

ref segment: La llaman en la residencia.
src segment: There's a call for you from your residence.

ref segment: No la vamos a enviar de vuelta para enfrentarse al Kenpeitai o a la Resistencia.
src segment: We're not going to send you back to face the Kempeitai or the Resistance.

ref segment: Si la hubiera visto, ¿por qué te lo diría?
src segment: And if I have, why would I tell you?

ref segment: No diga que no la avisé.
src segment: Don't say I didn't warn you.

ref segment: No diga que no la avisé.
src segment: Don't say I didn't warn you.

ref segment: Nadie va a salir de la casa hasta que descubramos quién la está persiguiendo.
src segment: No one is to leave the house, until we find exactly who is following you.

ref segment: Siempre lo es hasta que la llevan al cajero para deshacer la maldición de su dinero.
src segment: - Well, it is until they get you to the ATM to take the curse off your money.

ref segment: Encuentra indicios ¿y a dónde la conducen?
src segment: You find clues that lead you to...

ref segment: Verá, me estoy esforzando en comprender por qué no recomiendo que la acusen de malgastar su tiempo con esta tontería.
src segment: You know, I'm struggling to see why I don't recommend to the Met that they charge you with wasting their time with this stunt.

ref segment: ¿Y luego, cuando la encontraron y le dijeron que tenía problemas?
src segment: And then, when we found you and told you she was in trouble...?

ref segment: La siguiente vez que Alyssa la llamó, ¿qué le dijo?
src segment: And the next time Alyssa called you, what did she say?

ref segment: ¿La llamó su asistente, no el Sr. Peter?
src segment: His assistant called you, not Mr. Peters?

ref segment: Hizo que su asistente la llamara para decirle que su hija estaba muerta.
src segment: He had his assistant call you to tell you your daughter was dead.

ref segment: Como resultado, las bicicletas van rápido y la lanzaron a la carretera.
src segment: As it turns out, bikes go fast and flip you into the road.

ref segment: Bien, dígales que yo la obligué.
src segment: All right, tell them I forced you.

ref segment: ¿Quién la encontró?
src segment: Who found you?

ref segment: Si la estoy entrevistando, no me puedo ir tan pronto.
src segment: I'm supposed to be interviewing you. I can't leave so quickly.

ref segment: Pero usted sabe que yo nunca, nunca la voy a dejar, ¿cierto?
src segment: But you know that I will never, never leave you, right?

ref segment: Nunca he estado en Queens y no la conozco.
src segment: I've never been to Queens and I don't know you.

ref segment: Hace como si nada la afectara, pero en el fondo... en el fondo es mucho más frágil que todo eso.
src segment: You pretend nothing affects you but actually... deep down, you're fragile.

ref segment: Mi suposición es que Milo Khoury la contrató para aprender de los primeros y aplicarlo en los últimos.
src segment: My guess is Milo Khoury hired you to learn from the former and apply it to the latter.

ref segment: Fui al lugar, pero es imposible determinar qué la matará.
src segment: It was impossible to determine what would kill you, and if I had intervened...

ref segment: Decirle que la escuche.
src segment: Tell him to listen to you.

ref segment: La doctora la verá ahora.
src segment: The doctor will see you now.

ref segment: - Ya la están esperando, Srta. Moffat.
src segment: - They're ready for you now, Miss Moffat.

ref segment: Dice aquí que se separó de su esposo luego de que la golpeó en la cara.
src segment: It says here that you separated from your husband It says here that you separated from your husband after he struck you in the face.

ref segment: El encargado la notificó, ¿no?
src segment: The building manager notified you, yes?

ref segment: Te la está jugando.
src segment: He's playing you.

ref segment: Aquí dice que se separó de su marido después de que la golpeó en el rostro.
src segment: It says here that you separated from your husband after he struck you in the face.

ref segment: De acuerdo, tengo que ir a perseguir a este auto, pero le prometo que la mantendré informada.
src segment: Okay, I have to go chase down this car, but I-I promise to keep you in the loop.

ref segment: Bien, la llevaremos al hospital.
src segment: Okay, we're gonna get you to the hospital.

ref segment: Ya la tengo.
src segment: I got you now.

ref segment: ¿Qué la trae un sábado?
src segment: What brings you in on a Saturday?

ref segment: Pero la gente la necesita en Shanghai.
src segment: But the people need you in Shanghai.

ref segment: - Su hija la necesita arriba. - De acuerdo.
src segment: - Your daughter needs you upstairs.

ref segment: Ahora, la envió con un destacamento completo.
src segment: Now, I'm sending you with a full detail.

ref segment: Lo pulsa, y seis Agentes la rodearan en cuestión de segundos.
src segment: You press it, and six agents will be surrounding you in seconds.

ref segment: Señora, el Presidente la necesita.
src segment: Ma'am, the president needs you.

ref segment: Srta. Moore, no la conozco muy bien, y no tengo derecho a preguntar esto, pero significaría mucho para mí si lo postergara un poco antes de hacerlo.
src segment: Miss Moore, I don't know you very well, and I have no right to ask this, but it'd mean a lot to me if you just hold off for a moment before you do that.

ref segment: El senador me pidió que la ayudara.
src segment: The senator told me to help you.

ref segment: El general la está esperando.
src segment: The general's expecting you.

ref segment: ¿Sabe por qué la he hecho parar?
src segment: Do you know why I pulled you over?

ref segment: Cuando llegó, Srta. Clack, pensé que su necesidad de dinero la guiaba y que tal vez su admiración por Godfrey la llevaba a imaginarse cercana a él a fuerza de defenderlo.
src segment: When first you arrived, Miss Clack, I thought your need for money drove you and then perhaps your admiration for Godfrey led you to imagine yourself closer to him by means of being his defence.

ref segment: ¿Son celos que la carcomen?
src segment: Is it jealousy that eats at you?

ref segment: No puedo creer que Godfrey Ablewhite la seguiría en esto.
src segment: Well, I cannot believe that Godfrey Ablewhite would follow you in this.

ref segment: He tardado pero la he encontrado.
src segment: It took a while, but I found you.

ref segment: Un voluntario la llevará de vuelta.
src segment: A volunteer will bring you back up.

ref segment: Se... supone que la he de consolar, no moquearle encima.
src segment: I'm... supposed to be comforting you, not snotting all over you.

ref segment: ¿Cómo la ayudamos exactamente?
src segment: How do we help you exactly?

ref segment: ¿Cómo la llamaban los chicos?
src segment: What was it the boys used to call you?

ref segment: Su Tiger la está buscando.
src segment: Your Tiger is looking for you.

ref segment: El resultado de su ADN la va a identificar como Giza Barerra.
src segment: Your DNA is going to come back IDing you as Giza Barerra.

ref segment: Tenía 14 años cuando su papá la casó con un hombre 40 años mayor.
src segment: You were 14 years old when your father married you to a man 40 years older than you.

ref segment: Me han dado instrucciones para que la prepare para cirugía anticipando un resultado positivo.
src segment: I've been instructed to prep you for surgery in anticipation of a positive result.

ref segment: ¿Este es el hombre que la secuestró?
src segment: Is this the man who kidnapped you?

ref segment: Congresista Hookstraten, la última vez que hablamos le dije que la mantendría informada sobre el atentado del Capitolio.
src segment: Congresswoman Hookstraten, last time we spoke, I told you I'd keep you updated on the Capitol bombing.

ref segment: Así que pensé que quizá la llevó a donde hace sus análisis profundos.
src segment: So I thought maybe he'd taken you to the place where he does his deep dives.

ref segment: Él la llamó psicópata.
src segment: He called you a psycho.

ref segment: Mire, la pondré al día en cuanto sepamos algo.
src segment: Look, I'll update you as soon as we know.

ref segment: Niko, si tuviéramos alguna información que pudiera ayudar... te la daría.
src segment: Niko, if we had any information that could help, I'd tell you.

ref segment: Si ahora no dice nada... asumiré que Elina no la visitó porque tenía una enfermedad venérea.
src segment: If you don't say anything now I will assume that Elina didn't visit you because she had a venereal disease.

ref segment: Yo no la aprecio.
src segment: I don't appreciate you.

ref segment: Ha sido perseguida por alguien que, hasta el momento que la contactó, solo perseguía a agresores de chicas adolescentes.
src segment: You were being pursued by someone who, up until the moment he contacted you, had only pursued the predators of teenage girls.

ref segment: Agentes de la Oficina de Asuntos Internos la llevarán con el fiscal, donde será acusada de excederse de sus poderes y fallar en cumplir sus deberes.
src segment: Officers from the Internal Affairs Office will take you to the prosecutor, where you'll be charged with exceeding your powers and failure to fulfill your duties.

ref segment: Quien sea que la puso aquí, podría haber asesinado a Joaquin Pereya.
src segment: Whoever placed you here, might've had Joaquin Pereya murdered.

ref segment: Entendemos que nunca esperó que nadie la relacionara con esos homicidios, pero... aun así habría sido buena idea no conservar tanta evidencia en su apartamento.
src segment: We get that you never expected anyone to connect you to these murders, but... it still would have been a good idea not to keep so much evidence in your apartment.

ref segment: - ¿Liak la envió? - No, señor.
src segment: Did Liak send you?

ref segment: ¿Qué la trajo al bosque?
src segment: What brought you to the woods?

ref segment: El presidente de la Asociación Médica la ha acusado de buscar llamar la atención.
src segment: The president of the AMA has accused you of attention-seeking.

ref segment: Se la chuparemos porque estuvo fantástico.
src segment: This is where we all blow you because you were so freaking great.

ref segment: Su esposo está muy lejos, y teme que él ya no la ame o la desee.
src segment: Your husband is a long way away, and you fear he no longer loves or desires you.

ref segment: Viniste a mi cuarto, ¡y te la chupé en mi jacuzzi!
src segment: We went back to my place, and I blew you in my hot tub!

ref segment: Dígame, Zeta. ¿por qué la despidió Elias años atrás, sin darle una carta de recomendación?
src segment: So tell me, Zeta, all those years ago, why did Elias fire you without a reference?

ref segment: Sí, hace mucho. Estoy seguro de que su don ya se lo habrá dicho, pero la hemos eliminado de nuestra lista.
src segment: Yes, it was, and I'm sure that your gift will already have told you this, but, er... we have eliminated you from our enquiries.

ref segment: ¿Considera que el amor de su esposo la ha salvado de algo alguna vez?
src segment: Do you consider your husband's love to have ever saved you from anything?

ref segment: No la conozco muy bien.
src segment: I don't know you that well.

ref segment: Lo siento, la vi aquí y asumí que usted era ella.
src segment: Sorry, I saw you here and assumed you were her.

ref segment: ¿Cuál sería su primera acción en la empresa si la contratamos?
src segment: What would you do first in the firm if we hired you?

ref segment: No la habia visto.
src segment: I haven't seen you.

ref segment: Señora, Marcus la necesita en el laboratorio.
src segment: Ma'am, Marcus wants you at the lab.

ref segment: Dra. Jordan, me imaginé que la encontraría aquí.
src segment: Ah, Dr. Jordan. I thought I might find you here.

ref segment: Amy la verá ahora.
src segment: - Amy will see you now.

ref segment: Me la voy a llevar.
src segment: I'm going to take you with me.

ref segment: Me la voy a llevar...
src segment: I'm going to take you with me...

ref segment: Me la voy a llevar.
src segment: I'm going to take you with me.

ref segment: ¡Nunca la vi en este tren!
src segment: Never seen you on the train before.

ref segment: Su marido la vendió, señora.
src segment: Your husband has bargained you away, madam.

ref segment: Me la vendió a cambio de un trozo de madera.
src segment: He has sold you to me in exchange for a piece of wood.

ref segment: Intente describir... lo que más la angustia, mi señora.
src segment: Try and, er... describe... .. what most distresses you, my lady.

ref segment: "Perdón, no la escuché con toda esta lluvia."
src segment: Gee, I'm sorry, I didn't hear you in all this rain.

ref segment: Vas a morir, pero cuanto más dolor sientas la aumentará.
src segment: You will die, but how much pain you feel is up to you.

ref segment: Tenemos un testigo que la ubica en su casa.
src segment: We have an eyewitness placing you at the house.

ref segment: Está bien, digamos que su historia es cierta y este hombre misterioso es el solucionador de Montgomery, que irrumpió en su oficina y la incriminó.
src segment: Okay, let's just say that your story is true, and this mystery man is Montgomery's fixer, who broke into your office to frame you.

ref segment: - Hola. Su reputación la precede.
src segment: Your reputation precedes you.

ref segment: Mire, señora, ni siquiera sé cómo se llama... pero usted encendió un fuego en mí que no he podido apagar... desde el momento en que la vi.
src segment: Look, lady, I don't even know your name... but you set off a fire inside of me I have not been able to put out... since the moment I laid eyes on you.

ref segment: Déjeme que la acompañe a casa, por favor.
src segment: Let me escort you home, please.

ref segment: Pues, que Dios la bendiga porque nunca me atreví a soñar que encontraría un mejor lugar para mí.
src segment: Well, God bless you, 'cause I never dared to dream that I would find such a perfect place for myself.

ref segment: Por qué no me deja las fotos y un numero de contacto, y me aseguraré de que la llame en cuanto las vea.
src segment: Why don't you leave me the picture and a contact number, and I'll be sure he calls you as soon as he sees them.

ref segment: Los chicos que la trajeron dijeron que ese era su nombre.
src segment: Oh, the boys who dropped you off said that was your name.

ref segment: Yo no la maté, aunque, siendo justos, no echaré de menos a esa vaca fea.
src segment: My only regret is that I didn't stop you before you killed one of our own, and now you have to be punished.

ref segment: La directora la convocó tres veces, por fin Ud. acudió pero... para decirle que no se metiera en su vida.
src segment: The principal summoned you 3 times.

ref segment: Y que su hijo no vaya al colegio y pase su tiempo en las calles, ¿no la preocupa?
src segment: Awandering, truant teenager doesn't stress you out?

ref segment: Sí, entiendo pero ellos me pidieron que la llamara.
src segment: I got that, ma'am, but they told me to call you back.

ref segment: ¿Llamo a su familia para que la venga a buscar?
src segment: Miss, should I call your family to pick you up?

ref segment: Sra. Keene, le dije que yo la acompañaría afuera.
src segment: Ms. Keene, I told you I'd take you outside.

ref segment: Señora, deje que la ayude con eso.
src segment: - Ma'am let me help you with those please.

ref segment: El Sr. Litsky, mi jefe de gabinete, la acompañará al lugar.
src segment: Mr. Litsky, my chief of staff, will escort you to the facilities.

ref segment: Está bien, está bien, te la mando.
src segment: Okay, okay, I'm sending you.

ref segment: - El señor Dawes la está esperando en su oficina.
src segment: - Mr. dawes is waiting for you in his office.

ref segment: La Srta.Simons la llamó varias veces en los últimos días.
src segment: Miss Simons had called you several times over the last few days.

ref segment: Seguro que la corrigió cuando se dirigió a él.
src segment: And surely, he corrected you when you addressed him?

ref segment: Su esposo la envía a hablar como matona.
src segment: Your husband sends you to talk tough.

ref segment: Ellas la aplastarían si le cayeran en los hombros.
src segment: They would crush you if they fell on your shoulders.

ref segment: Lo siento si la hice esperar.
src segment: Sorry if I kept you waiting at all.

ref segment: ¿Cómo la trata el santo matrimonio?
src segment: How's holy matrimony treating you?

ref segment: No me la imagine como cliente frecuente.
src segment: I never pictured you for a repeating customer.

ref segment: Señora Edwards, creo que la hemos escuchado suficiente.
src segment: Mrs. Edwards, I believe we've heard enough out of you.

ref segment: ¿Usted sabe por qué la detuve?
src segment: Do you know why I pulled you over?

ref segment: Los delitos por los que la detuvieron no son los cargos a que se enfrenta ahora.
src segment: The offences we arrested you for in public bear no relation to the charges you now face.

ref segment: ¿Y sabía que su firma estaba en los documentos que la acusaban de ladrona?
src segment: And you know his signature was on the document accusing you of theft?

ref segment: El la inculpó.
src segment: He framed you.

ref segment: ¿La ha enviado Verity?
src segment: Did Verity send you?

ref segment: ¿La ha enviado Verity?
src segment: Did Verity send you?

ref segment: Está escondiendo algo, su flequillo la traiciona.
src segment: You're hiding something. Your bangs betray you.

ref segment: Muchos testigos la vieron
src segment: Several witnesses testified that they've seen you

ref segment: - Yo ya la amo.
src segment: - I love you already.

ref segment: ¿De su formación qué la califica para inventar nuevos términos?
src segment: What in your background, Mrs Johnson, qualifies you to make up new medical terms?

ref segment: Estaba empezando a pensar que nunca la veríamos de nuevo.
src segment: I was beginning to think we'd never see you again.

ref segment: ¿Entonces la volveremos a ver el jueves?
src segment: So we'll see you again Thursday?

ref segment: La directora la verá ahora.
src segment: The principal will see you now.

ref segment: ¿Por qué no la llevamos a un piso franco?
src segment: Why don't we take you to a safe house?

ref segment: que no la avisé.
src segment: that I did not warn you.

ref segment: Este cliente que la violó.
src segment: This client who raped you.

ref segment: ¿E incluso eso no hizo que Walter Nunn la tomara en serio?
src segment: And even that didn't make Walter Nunn take you seriously?

ref segment: ¿Le molesta contestar mis preguntas, o desea que la llevemos?
src segment: Do you mind answering my question, or do you want us to take you in?

ref segment: ¿El inspector Nunn la convenció de abandonar una queja por violación que hizo hace dos años?
src segment: Did Inspector Nunn persuade you to drop a rape complaint that you made two years ago?

ref segment: ¿Fue éste el hombre que la violó esa noche?
src segment: Was this the man who raped you that night?

ref segment: - Nadie la acusaba de nada.
src segment: - Nobody was accusing you of anything.

ref segment: ¿Por qué no vienes aquí para que me la pueda limpiar?
src segment: Why don't you come here and let me wipe you off?

ref segment: ¿Te parezco alguien que necesita que la cuiden?
src segment: Do I strike you as someone who needs lookin' after?

ref segment: Si cree que su marido la está engañando, tiene que hacerle frente.
src segment: If you think your husband's cheating on you, you have to confront him.

ref segment: pero el verdadero secreto es, ella la estuvo engañando... con un hombre.
src segment: But the real secret is, she's two-timing you -- With a man. I know.

ref segment: Verá, es plausible que la ubiquemos en el estacionamiento cuando él murió.
src segment: You see, love, it's plausible we can place you in the car park at the time of death.

ref segment: Uno de los oficiales de la patrulla la reconoció.
src segment: One of the patrol officers recognized you.

ref segment: No la voy a necesitar tanto tiempo.
src segment: I won't be needing you that long.

ref segment: Vale, déjeme... deje que haga una llamada y la vuelvo a llamar.
src segment: Um, okay, let me, uh... [sighs] let me make a quick call, and, uh, I-I'll call you back.

ref segment: El sargento Andrews la escoltará a su auto.
src segment: Sergeant Andrews will escort you to your car.

ref segment: Puedo hacer que una ambulancia la lleve al laboratorio de cardiología más cercano si no tiene a nadie quien la lleve.
src segment: I can have an ambulance transfer you to the nearest cardiology lab if you don't have someone who can drive you.

ref segment: Y la estaremos vigilando todo el tiempo.
src segment: And we'll be supervising you the entire time.

ref segment: - ¿Este tipo la está molestando?
src segment: - Is this guy bugging you?

ref segment: Sus hijos la van a abandonar.
src segment: Your boys will soon dump you!

ref segment: - "Su esposo", me la ha vendido a cambio de un trozo de madera.
src segment: ~ 'Your husband,' he has sold you to me in exchange for a piece of wood.

ref segment: Su esposo la dejó atrás.
src segment: Your husband left you behind.

ref segment: Creo que aun siendo ciego, la habría podido reconocer.
src segment: Even blind, I think I'd have recognized you.

ref segment: - Sí, sí. La iba a llamar.
src segment: Sorry, I was going to call you back.

ref segment: Pensaba que la había visto en la iglesia.
src segment: I thought I saw you at the church.

ref segment: Por lo tanto, ¿qué la trae de vuelta aquí?
src segment: So, what brings you back here?

ref segment: Dice aquí que Rance la atacó en su apartamento.
src segment: You say here Rance assaulted you in your apartment.

ref segment: Ud. podría haber tenido una parte y haber sido un millón de libras más rica si no la hubieran echado.
src segment: You could have had your share and been a million pounds richer if they hadn't thrown you out.

ref segment: - ¿Con qué la golpeó?
src segment: - What did he hit you with?

ref segment: Alguien la ha llamado?
src segment: Somebody called you?

ref segment: Vale, escuche, voy a hacer que el agente Krebbs la lleve a donde necesite.
src segment: Okay, look, I'm gonna get Officer Krebbs to take you where you need to go.

ref segment: Yo... dejaré esta información aquí para que la miren.
src segment: I'll just - - I'll leave this information here with you.

ref segment: ¿El Sr. Skokie la dejó volver a su casa?
src segment: Mr. Skokie let you back into his home?

ref segment: Creí que la había visto en las escuelas de pintura.
src segment: I thought I saw you at the painting schools.

ref segment: Ojalá pudiera ver qué es lo que la cautiva tanto.
src segment: I wish I could see what it is that so beguiles you.

ref segment: Si Alison la lesionó a propósito, ¿por qué no quería denunciarla?
src segment: If Alison injured you on purpose, why wouldn't you want to report it?

ref segment: No se la ve.
src segment: We never saw you.

ref segment: Él la engañó.
src segment: He cheated on you.

ref segment: Apoye su carga en el Señor y Él la sostendrá.
src segment: Cast your burden on the lord, and he will sustain you.

ref segment: ¿El Sr. Lahey la siguió a casa?
src segment: Mr. Lahey followed you home that night?

ref segment: ¿El Sr. Lahey la siguió hasta casa?
src segment: Mr. Lahey followed you home that night?

ref segment: - Bueno. ¿Pues bien... que te prometió Cookie, para que la eligieras ella?
src segment: Okay. Well, what exactly did Cookie promise you when you signed with her?

ref segment: No la he visto antes en Wragby.
src segment: I haven't seen you at Wragby before.

ref segment: Creo que la ha tomado por su madre.
src segment: Reckon he's took you for his mother.

ref segment: El coche la sacará de la finca.
src segment: The car will take you off the estate.

ref segment: Dios la bendijo de esa manera.
src segment: God blessed you that way.

ref segment: No la había visto en la enfermería antes.
src segment: I haven't seen you on infirmary duty before.

ref segment: Siento mucho si la he ofendido, Srta. Kringle.
src segment: I'm very sorry if I've offended you, Miss Kringle.

ref segment: Bien, bueno, voy a seguir trabajando en el caso, y la llamaré si siento la necesidad de ir a esta reunión.
src segment: Well, I'm gonna keep working the case, and I'm gonna call you if I feel the need to go to this meeting.

ref segment: He sido suspendido y no la veré más.
src segment: I've been suspended... and won't be seeing you anymore.

ref segment: Quizás eso la motivará de manera adecuada a ser sincera conmigo.
src segment: Maybe that will properly motivate you to be honest with me.

ref segment: Le volvería a traer de la muerte, si tengo que hacerlo... y la convertiría en algo que el mundo nunca ha visto.
src segment: I will bring you back from the dead, if I have to... and make you into something the world has never seen.

ref segment: Disculpe que la moleste.
src segment: Sorry to disturb you.

ref segment: Bueno, es difícil que la trate si no sé lo que pasa.
src segment: Uh, well, it's sort of hard for me to treat you if I don't know what's wrong.

ref segment: Si la dejo sola un momento, ¿me promete que no se irá?
src segment: If I leave you alone for a minute, do you promise not to leave?

ref segment: Nadie la estaba interrogando, Helen.
src segment: No one was interrogating you, Helen.

ref segment: Dijo que la ama más que a nada.
src segment: He said he loves you more than anything.

ref segment: Dijo que la traicionó.
src segment: He said he betrayed you.

ref segment: - El presidente la acaba de llamar.
src segment: - The president just called for you.

ref segment: - ¿Nadie la está esperando?
src segment: - Nobody's expecting you?

ref segment: Srta. Devore, nadie la está juzgando.
src segment: Miss devore, no one is judging you.

ref segment: ¿Sabes por qué la detuve, señora?
src segment: Do you know why I pulled you over, ma'am?

ref segment: Pero quiere echarle la culpa al hijo que la ha rechazado.
src segment: But you want to pin the blame on the son who's rejected you.

ref segment: He reunido al Estado Mayor para que la presenten una estrategia.
src segment: I've assembled the joint chiefs to present you with a strategy.

ref segment: El caso es que antes la engañamos.
src segment: The point is, we tricked you earlier.

ref segment: Tú la cagaste.

ref segment: Muy bien. La llevaré a su habitación.

ref segment: ¿Esto no es algo de lo que Lord Merton la haya persuadido?
src segment: So, this isn't something Lord Merton has persuaded you into? - Lord Merton?

src segment: I want a real marriage, a true marriage, with everything that that involves. And I hope I do not ask the indelicate when I send you back to relay this message.

ref segment: Siento por lo que la hice pasar, Sra. Bates.
src segment: I'm sorry for what we've put you through, Mrs Bates.

ref segment: Y después de que la dejó,
src segment: [Sniffles] And after he dropped you off, what did you do?

ref segment: - ¿La llamó Elaine?
src segment: - Did Elaine call you?

ref segment: No la estoy culpando, Sra. Murphy.
src segment: I'm not blaming you, Mrs. Murphy.

src segment: If you'd like to file a complaint against Mr. Crawford, I'll take your statement and then we'll go down to the hospital, where they'll examine you and will document your injuries and get a rape kit.

ref segment: ¿Así que la violó, y luego pasó la noche entera durmiendo al lado suyo?
src segment: So, he raped you, and then he spent the entire night sleeping next to you?

ref segment: Entonces, si quiere proseguir con esto y descubro que ha mentido, no solo la acusaré, sino que me aseguraré que cumpla cada día de su sentencia.
src segment: So, if you want to pursue this and I find out that you've lied, I'll not only charge you, but I'll make sure that you serve every single day of that sentence.

ref segment: Te la darán por esto.
src segment: They'll get you for it.

ref segment: ¿Y qué hombre, salvo un tonto, no la querría, Seymour?
src segment: And what man, except a fool, would not love you, Seymour?

ref segment: Nunca la mencionó.

ref segment: ¿La sorprendió con un diamante, o coche nuevo?
src segment: Surprise you with a diamond, a new car?

ref segment: Ellos la capacitarán y prepararán en su entrenamiento.

ref segment: ¿La está esperando?

ref segment: Sé que está comprometida, pero todavía no está casada, y este compañero se ha ido y la dejó, y... y no puedo evitar lo que siento.

ref segment: Usted es como una flor, y cuando la tuve en mis brazos...
src segment: You're like a flower, and when I held you in my arms...

ref segment: - La transferiré a facturaciones.
src segment: Okay. Letme transfer you to billing.

ref segment: El la está esperando?
src segment: Is he expecting you?

ref segment: Ella te la está jugando.

ref segment: Mis hombres la escoltarán a casa.

ref segment: - No la esperábamos.

ref segment: Nunca la dejaría sola.

src segment: And when you tried to get work elsewhere, he blackballed you, stole your ability to use your intellect because you would not have sex with him!

src segment: That the man you said you'd never met, a notorious criminal, had a mysterious relationship with the man who raised you?

src segment: Your cam shaft had too much end play, so I gave you a new cam, heads, replaced the gaskets in your manifold and carburetor, and then I upgraded you to a 6 speed tranny.

ref segment: No más doloroso de cuando Neil la dejó.

src segment: - I hope she wasn't bothering you.

ref segment: No permita que eso la altere.

ref segment: El partido la compensará la próxima vez.
src segment: The party will make it up to you in the next round.

ref segment: - Porque el partido la destruiría.
src segment: - Because the party will destroy you.

ref segment: El partido la cuidará.
src segment: The party'll take care of you.

ref segment: ¿Preferiría que la interrogara sola, Srta. Baxter?
src segment: Would you rather I questioned you alone, Miss Baxter?

ref segment: Todo lo que sé es que su experiencia cercana a la muerte la cambió, igual que la mía me cambió.
src segment: All I know is your N.D.E. changed you, just like mine changed me.

ref segment: Pensé que la reconocía, pero asumí que estaba equivocado.
src segment: I thought I recognized you, but I assumed I was mistaken.

ref segment: Bueno, ya sabe como el ENA no cree que las mujeres deban trabajar, pero dígales que su marido está enfermo y que él la ordenó conseguir un trabajo, y entonces, por alguna razón incomprensible la respetarán.
src segment: Well, you know how the ANA don't think that women should work, but you say your husband's sick and he ordered you to get a job, and then, for some mental reason, they respect you.

ref segment: ¡Creo que la amo, capitán Best!
src segment: I think I love you, Captain Best!

ref segment: No la esperábamos hasta mañana.

src segment: Then why did he call you from his disposable cellphone last Thursday at 10:42 A.M.?

src segment: He lied to you, medicated you with barbiturates after philandering with a woman half his age and half your intelligence, and yet you persist in agitating for his return.

ref segment: ¿Alguien la ha amenazado?
src segment: Did someone threaten you?

ref segment: Oh si. La he visto un par de veces.
src segment: Oh, yes, I've seen you a couple of times.

ref segment: Javier la tiene que haber puesto en esto.

ref segment: Pero nunca la abandoné, ¿o sí?

ref segment: - Espero que esta noticia la complazca.

ref segment: Bueno, un escáner portátil, ellos probablemente la habían estado siguiendo
src segment: Well, portable scanner, they'd probably been following you

ref segment: Testificó ante el gran jurado que el Sr. Drake la golpeó y la violó.

ref segment: Pero la quieren allí a las 7:30.

ref segment: Tengo la sensación de que nada la asusta.
