ref segment: Agarre mi mano y le prometo que la conduciré a un lugar seguro.
src segment: Hold my hand and I promise I will lead you to safety.

ref segment: Pocos días después de que él la atacó, Él llega aquí medio muerto.
src segment: Few days after that man attacks you, he's rolled in here half dead.

ref segment: Ahora, ¿él la golpeó, señora?
src segment: - Now, did he hit you, lady? - What?

ref segment: Dígame, ¿en qué modo se materializa la idiotez de su hijo y como eso la llevo a tener deudas?
src segment: Tell me, in what way does your son's stupidity materialize and how has that incurred you in debt?

ref segment: No tiene ni un rasguño, lo cual es imposible salvo que se pusiera ahí donde la encontramos después de la explosión, cosa que creo que hizo.
src segment: There's not a scratch on you, which is impossible, unless you placed yourself where we found you after the explosion, which I believe that you did.

ref segment: ¿Está admitiendo que Tate Harrison la violó y que... es el padre biológico de su hijo y que por eso lo mató?
src segment: Are you admitting that Tate Harrison raped you and that he is the biological father of your son and that is why you killed him?

ref segment: El Doctor la está esperando en el balcón.
src segment: The Doctor is waiting for you on the balcony. - Oh.

ref segment: Nuestro Salvador la bendice de muchas maneras.
src segment: Our Savior blesses you in so many ways.

ref segment: Si ella la pierde, ¿qué la quedará?
src segment: If she loses you, what will she have left?

ref segment: ¿Que la vigile, por si hace falta?
src segment: To keep an eye on you, if you need it?

ref segment: Me pidió que la avisara de cualquier pieza nueva que pudiera ser interesante, y me he encontrado con una o dos cosas, con lo que ¿cuándo cree que podría visitar la tienda?
src segment: Um, you had asked me to advise you of any new pieces that might be of interest, and I've come across one or two things, so when do you think you might be able to visit the shop?

ref segment: Señorita Crain, no la entretendré mucho.
src segment: Miss Crain, I won't keep you long.

ref segment: Lamento interrumpir, capitán, pero el jefe Taylor la llama a su oficina.
src segment: Sorry to interrupt, Captain, but, uh, Chief Taylor would like to see you in his office - right now.

ref segment: ¿Quiere que la ponga en la lista? ¿Otro día de esta semana?
src segment: Shall I put you on the roster?

ref segment: Si Prudence Swanson la hubiera visto con esos hombres...
src segment: If Prudence Swanson could have seen you with those men...

ref segment: Te la debía.
src segment: De nada. I owed you.

ref segment: Pediré a un juez que la obligue.
src segment: I will have a judge compel you to answer.

ref segment: Pediré a un juez que la obligue.
src segment: I will have a judge compel you to answer.

ref segment: No es por eso por lo que la hemos llamado. ¿Entonces por qué nos reunimos?
src segment: That's not why we asked you here. Oh. Then why are we meeting?

ref segment: O deberíamos suponer que su marido la llevó a todos estos médicos diferentes y no lo cargó a su seguro médico para que nadie supera lo a menudo que la agredía?
src segment: Or should we assume your late husband took you to different doctors and didn't submit the charges to his insurance company so no one would know how often he was assaulting you?

ref segment: ¿Quiere que la detenga por interferir con mi investigación?
src segment: You want me to detain you for interfering with my operation?

ref segment: La doctora la llamará con sus resultados.
src segment: Yeah. The doctor will call you with your results.

ref segment: ¿La ha contactado últimamente?
src segment: Has he contacted you lately?

ref segment: Su reputación la precede.
src segment: Your reputation precedes you.

ref segment: - Será la única abogada, así que la necesito allí.
src segment: You'll be the only attorney, so I'll need you there.

ref segment: Y el reconocimiento facial no la encontró en ninguna de nuestras bases de datos.
src segment: And facial recognition did not find you in any of our databases.

ref segment: Si viene alguno, entonces la mataré con mis propias manos.
src segment: If no one's coming, then I'll kill you with my own hands.

ref segment: - Hacía mucho tiempo que no la veía.
src segment: - I haven't seen you in a while.

ref segment: Me impresionó tanto su belleza cuando la vi en la fiesta de gala, y ahora, tras este agravio a mi persona, me veré obligado a arrancar esos encantadores ojos almendrados de su perfecto cráneo.
src segment: I was so struck by your beauty when I saw you at the gala, and now, after this affront to my person, I'll be forced to pluck those lovely almond eyes from your perfectly shaped skull.

ref segment: La he admirado desde que era joven.
src segment: I've admired you since I was young.

ref segment: Si está lista para ir a casa, los llamé para que la pasen a buscar.
src segment: If you're ready to go home, I'll call them to come pick you up.

ref segment: El presidente la está esperando,
src segment: The president's expecting you,

ref segment: ¿Ese hombre la amenazó?
src segment: Has this man threatened you at all?

ref segment: Se la ha debido estar jugando desde hace mucho, amigo, sabiendo que podría acabar necesitando un cabeza de turco.
src segment: he must have been playing you for a long time, buddy, knowing he would need a fall guy eventually.

ref segment: ¿Cree que Dmitry la quiere?
src segment: You think Dmitry loves you?

ref segment: Sam la engañó con esa chica, y la hizo enfadar.
src segment: Sam cheated on you with that girl, and it made you angry.

ref segment: Ya se habrá dado cuenta que no la he llamado para venir a trabajar.
src segment: By now, you've realized I haven't called you in to do work.

ref segment: Pero la veré aquí en dos semanas.
src segment: But I shall see you back here in two weeks.

ref segment: ¿O la puedo llamar Anne?
src segment: Or may I call you Anne?

ref segment: Si la estuviera siguiendo, Srta. Danvers, nunca lo sabría.
src segment: If I were following you, Ms. Danvers, you would never know about it.

ref segment: Un equipo de rescate la sacó del océano.
src segment: Rescue team pulled you out of the ocean.

ref segment: Tenemos órdenes ejecutivas que la obligan a cumplir.
src segment: We have an executive order forcing you to comply.

ref segment: Y creo que es hora de que el mundo la conozca.
src segment: And I think it's time for the world to meet you.

ref segment: Cualquier información que obtengamos sobre su mujer, se la diré inmediatamente.
src segment: Any information we find out about your wife, I'll tell you immediately.

ref segment: ¿Qué la trae al campo?
src segment: What brings you out into the field?

ref segment: Todo el jurado de blancos que la sentenció, solo les tomó 30 minutos para darle cadena perpetua.
src segment: The all-white jury that sentenced you only took 30 minutes to give you life in prison.

ref segment: Vuelva a su mesa hasta que los inspectores la llamen.
src segment: Go back to your desk, until the inspectors call you.

ref segment: Asuntos internos la está esperando.
src segment: The Inspectorate are waiting for you.

ref segment: ¿Quién la hará daño?
src segment: Who's gonna hurt you?

ref segment: ¿Si tuviera cualquier información sobre tu mujer, no crees que ya te la habría dicho?
src segment: If I had any new information about your wife, don't you think I would've told you by now?

ref segment: ¿Si tuviera alguna información sobre tu mujer, no crees que ya te la habría dicho?
src segment: If I had any new information about your wife, don't you think I would tell you?

ref segment: La conocía muy bien.
src segment: He knew you pretty well.

ref segment: Usted la golpeó y ahora ellos la están demandado.
src segment: You hit her, and now they're suing you.

ref segment: No te la pedí porque pensé que eso volvería las cosas raras.
src segment: I didn't ask you 'cause I thought that would make things weird.

ref segment: Perdone que la moleste, señora, pero estamos haciendo una ronda de rutina en la zona buscando cualquier tipo de actividad sospechosa.
src segment: Sorry to bother you, ma'am, but we're doing a routine sweep of the area, looking for any signs of suspicious activity.

ref segment: Señora Secretaria, si no le importa, la alcanzaré en unos minutos.
src segment: Madam Secretary, if you don't mind, I'll catch up with you in a few minutes.

ref segment: Pon una inicial aquí para dejar asentado que la recibiste.
src segment: Initial here to acknowledge you received it. I'm proud of you.

ref segment: Es grosero, sí, pero la primera enmienda no la protege de que hieran sus sentimientos.
src segment: It's rude, yeah, but the First Amendment doesn't protect you from hurt feelings.

ref segment: La he buscado, y vi que tenía hijos, así que entiende...
src segment: I actually looked you up, and I saw that you have kids, so you understand...

ref segment: ¿Ashley la dijo a dónde iba... antes de que desapareciera?
src segment: Did Ashley tell you where she was going before she went missing?

ref segment: No deja que las debilidades de los que la rodean... minen su fuerza.
src segment: You don't let weakness around you sap your strength.

ref segment: Ryan y Espo la llevarán a casa.
src segment: Ryan and Espo will take you home.

ref segment: Un agente la llevará.
src segment: A uniform will drive you.

ref segment: No la perseguiremos cuando pase por la tienda.
src segment: We won't come chasing after you every time you pass by the store.

ref segment: Deben haberse convertido en unas viejas, que la insultan alegremente.
src segment: They've all turned into old hags, and they're cheerfully cursing you.

ref segment: La estábamos esperando, Srta. Nagai.
src segment: We've been expecting you, Ms. Nagai.

ref segment: Porque espera que la apoye y que seamos dos contra uno.
src segment: 'Cause you're hoping I'll back you up and make it two against one.

ref segment: Haré que un agente la lleve a casa.
src segment: I'll have an officer take you home.

ref segment: Deje que la acompañe.
src segment: Let me walk you out.

ref segment: Pero... usted también... no olvide el hecho de que soy el único barco... que la llevará al mundo exterior.
src segment: But... for you as well... don't forget the fact that I'm the only boat that will take you to the outside world.

ref segment: Afortunadamente el doctor la ha curado bien así que no debería de haber ningún problema.
src segment: But I had doctors treat you so you should be fine.

ref segment: No estoy seguro, pero vendrá alguien del CID y la llevará en cuanto estén preparados, ¿de acuerdo?
src segment: I'm not sure, but someone from CID will come and get you soon as they're ready, OK?

ref segment: Él la buscó?
src segment: He sought you out?

ref segment: No es de extrañar que su marido la llamó una... ¿Cómo fue lo que la llamó?
src segment: No wonder your husband called you an... What was it he called you?

ref segment: ¿Entiende que se declara culpable del primer cargo, lo que la acusa de asesinato en primer grado por la muerte de Grant Hapstall?
src segment: Do you understand that you're pleading guilty to count one of the information, which charges you with first-degree murder in the death of grant Hapstall?

ref segment: ¿Y del segundo cargo, lo que la acusa de asesinato en primer grado por la muerte de Ursula Hapstall?
src segment: And count two, which charges you with first-degree murder in the death of Ursula Hapstall?

ref segment: Si tuviera alguna novedad sobre su mujer, ¿no cree que se la hubiera dicho?
src segment: If I had any new information about your wife, don't you think I would tell you?

ref segment: Entonces la encontraremos.
src segment: Then we'll find you.

ref segment: Él la ama y la va a llevar a casa.
src segment: He loves you, and he's gonna take you home.

ref segment: Hay una Kara Dougherty abajo que la quiere ver.
src segment: There's a Kara Dougherty downstairs to see you.

ref segment: ¿Por qué no la ayudo con eso?
src segment: Why don't I help you with that?

ref segment: ¿Y eso nunca la alarmó?
src segment: And that, uh, never raised any red flags with you, huh?

ref segment: ¿Cuándo la llamó?
src segment: When did he call you?

ref segment: Woo, ni siquiera quisiste esperar a que yo te la entregara.
src segment: Plus applause woo, you don't even want to wait Woo, you don't even want to wait for me to come to you.

ref segment: No la había visto nunca por aquí.
src segment: Haven't seen you around here before.

ref segment: No estoy diciendo que no la crea.
src segment: Not saying I don't believe you.

ref segment: ¿Qué causa noble la trae a tribunales?
src segment: What noble cause brings you to court?

ref segment: ¿Qué la llevó a sospechar del acusado en primer lugar?
src segment: What led you to suspect the defendant in the first place?

ref segment: Así que, déjeme conseguir un coche que la lleve a la ciudad.
src segment: So, let me arrange a car, to take you to city.

ref segment: Dra. Saroyan, no era mi intención, pero la he oído fuera de la sala de huesos cuando estaba con ese hombre.
src segment: Dr. Saroyan, I didn't mean to, but I heard you outside the bone room earlier with that man. Oh.

ref segment: Solamente porque la presioné contra la pared... no está pensando en algo erótico, ¿no?
src segment: Just because I pressed you against the wall you're not thinking about something erotic, are you?

ref segment: Ha dicho que la Dra. Fisher la engañó para que donara tejidos, ¿pero no es esta su firma en este formulario de autorización?
src segment: You said that Dr. Fisher tricked you into donating tissue, but isn't that your signature there on the release form?

ref segment: Ha dicho que la Dra. Fisher la engañó en lo de donar el tejido.
src segment: You said that Dr. Fisher tricked you into donating tissue.

ref segment: Pensó que te estaba haciendo un favor hasta que la reclutaron cuando era una niña pequeña.
src segment: Thought she was doing you a favor until they recruited you when you were a little kid.

ref segment: Al día siguiente, 24 de octubre, ¿el acusado la llamó?
src segment: The next day, October 24, did the defendant call you?

ref segment: Pero la llamamos como esposa.
src segment: But we're calling you as a wife.

ref segment: ¿Así que está pensando que Kwon Jae Hee no la reconocerá... si lleva la misma ropa y y peinado similar a Cho Rim?
src segment: So you're thinking that Kwon Jae Hee won't recognize you... if you're wearing the same clothes and similar hairstyle as Cho Rim?

ref segment: - Lamento si la ofendimos.
src segment: Oh, I'm so sorry if we've offended you.

ref segment: ¿Tiene a alguien que la cuide?
src segment: Is there anyone to take care of you?

ref segment: Su nombre es Bobby Cordero... creo que es el hombre que la atacó en el parque esa noche.
src segment: His name is Bobby Cordero, I think he's the man who attacked you in the park that night.

ref segment: ¿Al menos sabe qué hacer si un hombre la ataca con un cuchillo?
src segment: Do you even know what to do if a man comes at you with a knife?

ref segment: Lo siento. ¿Qué la califica para hacer ese diagnóstico?
src segment: I'm sorry. What qualifies you to make that prognosis?

ref segment: Porque cuando la conocí, me dijo que se iban a quedar por el fin de semana.
src segment: Because when I first met you, you told me you were staying for the weekend.

ref segment: Te la están limpiando ahora mismo.
src segment: They're cleaning you out, right now.

ref segment: Entiendo que la pusimos en una situación incómoda... pidiéndole estar aquí, pero apreciamos mucho su ayuda.
src segment: I understand, that we've put you in a uncomfortable position, by asking you here, but we really do appreciate your help.

ref segment: Sra. Thomas, la meteremos a su cubículo en cuando podamos.
src segment: Mrs Thomas, we'll have you into a cubicle as soon as possible.

ref segment: Hermana Millar, dije que la llamaríamos cuando estuviéramos preparadas.
src segment: Sister Millar, I said we'd call you when we're ready.

ref segment: Te la dejé perfectamente.
src segment: I set you up perfectly.

ref segment: No te pido que la revises página por página solo que me ayudes a entablar un diálogo elocuente.
src segment: I'm not asking you to go through it page by page. Just to help me initiate some meaningful dialogue.

ref segment: Haré que alguien la lleve al hospital.
src segment: I'll get someone to take you to the hospital.

ref segment: Juraría que la he visto antes.
src segment: I could swear I've seen you before.

ref segment: Nadie la está señalando, si esas eran las instrucciones, quiero decir.
src segment: Nobody's blaming you, I mean if those were Akers' instructions.

ref segment: Salga para que la veamos.
src segment: Please come out where we can see you.

ref segment: Traeremos un médico para que la examine y al mismo tiempo la protegeremos.
src segment: We'll have a doctor look at you, and in the meantime, we'll take care of you.

ref segment: La Dra. Kaur la verá ahora mismo y después vendrá el especialista en quemaduras y verá sus manos.
src segment: Dr Kaur will see you now, and then the burns specialist will come and have a look at your hands.

ref segment: Perdone que la moleste en su casa, señora. ¿Puedo pasar?
src segment: Sorry to disturb you at home, ma'am. Can I come in, please?

ref segment: Linsay Denton, por la presente la volvemos a arrestar.
src segment: Lindsay Denton, we're hereby returning you to custody.

ref segment: - Norman la llevará de vuelta a la ciudad.
src segment: Norman will drive you back to town.

ref segment: Tantos años que no la veíamos.
src segment: So many years, we no see you.

ref segment: Las respuestas falsas la ponen en riesgo de perjurio, ¿entiende?
src segment: False answers put you at risk of perjury, you understand?

ref segment: Si queréis, os la podemos vender, a un precio ventajoso para todos.
src segment: If you want, we can sell to you at an attractive price to everyone.

ref segment: Stuart dijo que no la moleste con esto.
src segment: Stuart said not to bother you with it.

ref segment: Ahora veo por qué la llaman Señorita Hoover (Aspiradora)
src segment: Wow. Now I see why they call you Miss Hoover.

ref segment: Dejé que se la devuelva.
src segment: Let me give that back to you.

ref segment: - ¿Quién la ha enviado?
src segment: - Who sent you?

ref segment: No estoy segura de lo que recuerda sobre su infancia, pero estoy segura de que la quiere.
src segment: I'm not sure what she remembers about her childhood, but I'm sure she loves you.

ref segment: Qué Dios la bendiga en su aniversario, querida hermana.
src segment: May God bless you on your jubilee, my dear Sister. Oh!

ref segment: Sigue en Lyon. ¿No la ha llamado?
src segment: He recalled not you?

ref segment: ¿Alguien la vió?
src segment: Did anyone see you?

ref segment: ¿Él la envió?
src segment: He sent you?

ref segment: Se que controlaba su cuerpo y cómo controlaba sus finanzas, y la mantenía casi sin dinero a pesar de su éxito.
src segment: I know he controlled your body and how he controlled your finances and kept you on a very tight budget despite his success.

ref segment: ¿Qué le pidió el que la llamó?
src segment: What did the caller ask you?

ref segment: La Dra. Black la quiere ver arriba.
src segment: Oh, Dr. Black wants to see you upstairs.

ref segment: Dra. Black, la necesitan en...
src segment: Dr. Black, they need you downstairs in radiology stat.

ref segment: Sí la reconozco.
src segment: I do recognize you.

ref segment: Mi cliente la ha tratado muy pobremente, ¿no?
src segment: Er, my client has treated you very shabbily, hasn't he?

ref segment: Un pajarito quería que la matase.
src segment: I think a little birdie wanted me to kill you.

ref segment: Sus amigos la han echado mucho de menos.
src segment: Your friends have missed you dearly.

ref segment: La próxima victoria en las primarias la pone en la cima.
src segment: The next primary win puts you over the top.

ref segment: Él la venera.
src segment: He venerates you.

ref segment: No la había reconocido.
src segment: I didn't recognize you there.

ref segment: - Entonces, tal vez la llame.
src segment: - Then perhaps I'll call on you.

ref segment: Creo que supo de sus mentiras, y la enfrentó con la evidencia.
src segment: I think he learned of your lies, and confronted you with the evidence.

ref segment: La hermana Julienne dice que si come un buen almuerzo, estará contenta de que la cuidemos y no llamaremos al doctor.
src segment: Sister Julienne says that if you eat a good lunch, she's happy for us to take care of you, and won't send for Doctor.

ref segment: Pero si la alejara de la partería... posiblemente durante semanas... las madres y los bebés del distrito sufrirían.
src segment: But if I were to take you away from midwifery - possibly for weeks - the mothers and babies of the district would suffer.

ref segment: Deje que la acompañe.
src segment: Let me walk you back.

ref segment: ¿Esto no la molesta en absoluto?
src segment: This doesn't bother you at all?

ref segment: Prometo que la sacaré en un momento.
src segment: I promise I'm gonna have you out of there in just a second.

ref segment: Sabe perfectamente que se me prohibió que la ayude.
src segment: You know perfectly well that I was forbidden to help you.

ref segment: Señorita Diaz, solo necesitamos una confirmación verbal de que el agente Mendez la violó. ¿Puede confirmárnoslo?
src segment: Miss Diaz, we just need verbal confirmation... that Officer Mendez forced himself on you. - Can you provide that?

ref segment: ¿Quieres que te la cuente o prefieres leerla en las noticias?
src segment: Do you want me to tell you, or do you want to read about it in the news?"

ref segment: La esperaba desde hace una hora. ¿Qué la retrasó?
src segment: I expected you over an hour ago. What kept you?

ref segment: No sé mucho, pero apostaría a que Dios la tendrá en muy distinta consideración a la hermana Clarice en el momento de atravesar las puertas del cielo.
src segment: I don't know much, but I would wager that God will put you far ahead of Sister Clarice when it comes to passing through the pearly gates.

ref segment: EI Sr. Barrow la buscaba.
src segment: Mr. Barrow is looking for you.

ref segment: Cuando este juego acabe, te la voy a devolver.
src segment: When this game is over, I'm gonna shove you back.

ref segment: Cuando la vi en el café, entré en pánico.
src segment: When I saw you at the cafe, I panicked.

ref segment: ¿Recuerda aquel lugar al que la llevé el otro día?
src segment: You know that place I took you out to the other day?

ref segment: Por eso la elegí para actuar conmigo.
src segment: It's why I chose you to serve with me.

ref segment: Con un hombre para que la vigilara.
src segment: With a man to keep watch over you.

ref segment: Hace semanas que la escucho.
src segment: I have been listening to you for weeks now.

ref segment: Nunca pensé que la volvería a ver.
src segment: I never thought I'd see you again.

ref segment: Colgada de cabeza de ese modo, perderá la consciencia mucho antes que la apuñalen en la cara.
src segment: Bye! I will see you next Thursday! - Hillary:

ref segment: El CO la quiere de vuelta en el barco.
src segment: CO wants you back on the ship.

ref segment: - Bien. - ¿Tal vez la veamos en el próximo día de visitas?
src segment: - Ok. - Maybe we'll see you at the next Family Day?

ref segment: ¿La rechazaron?
src segment: They turned you down?

ref segment: Ojalá no la hubiera conocido.
src segment: I wish I had never met you.

ref segment: No la he visto nunca antes.
src segment: I've never seen you before.

ref segment: Oficial Kalakaua, deje que la recuerde que su inmunidad y medios no afectan a esta investigación.
src segment: Officer Kalakaua, let me remind you that your immunity and means doesn't effect this proceeding.

ref segment: Ni siquiera el gobernador la puede ayudar ahora.
src segment: Even the governor can't help you now.

ref segment: ¿Qué tal si te la pongo en el culo?
src segment: How about I put you on your arse, huh?

ref segment: Victor la adora.
src segment: Victor loves you.

ref segment: Dra. Walker, estos hombres la acompañarán al laboratorio.
src segment: Dr. Walker, these men will escort you back to the lab.

ref segment: Creo que la necesitan en traumatología.
src segment: I think they need you in trauma.

ref segment: Y yo quería decirle... que la echaré de menos.
src segment: And I wanted to say... I'm going to miss you.

ref segment: Matt todavía la ama.
src segment: Matt still loves you.

ref segment: Y, Sra. Jaymes, Bucky me ha pedido que la lleve con su productor del "live stream."
src segment: And Ms. Jaymes, Bucky asked that I bring you to your live-stream producer.

ref segment: ¿Y la localizaron?
src segment: And they tracked you down?

ref segment: Él la escuchará.
src segment: He will listen to you.

ref segment: Todavía la ama profundamente.
src segment: He still loves you deeply.

ref segment: La Sra. Bligh la llama, señora.
src segment: Mrs Bligh is asking for you, ma'am.

ref segment: Srta. Johnson, parece que alguien la anda buscando.
src segment: Uh, Mrs. Johnson, it seems someone's trying to track you down.

ref segment: Tiene más fe en que la tecnología la encuentre que en mí deteniéndolo.
src segment: You have more faith in the tech finding you than me stopping it.

ref segment: Ellos necesitaban su experiencia y la usaron para hacerse con ella.
src segment: They needed his expertise, and they used you to get it.

ref segment: Cuando acabe la operación, haré que alguien la introduzca en el quirófano, y se la daré a usted.
src segment: Well, when the surgery is over, I'll have someone bring you into the operating room, and I'll hand it to you.

ref segment: Tienes exactamente un minuto para dar explicaciones, antes de que abra esa puerta y haga que el Servicio Secreto la arreste.
src segment: You have exactly one minute to explain yourself, before I open that door and have Secret Service arrest you.

ref segment: Y eso es exactamente lo que el hombre que la llamó estará esperando.
src segment: Which is exactly what the man who called you will be waiting for.

ref segment: Esta persona la llama por su nombre. No lo sé.
src segment: This person calls you by name.

ref segment: ¿Ella la presionó? ¿Cómo?
src segment: She pressured you?

ref segment: Y cuando usted se negó, ¿ella la golpeó?
src segment: And when you refused, she hit you?

ref segment: Dos candidatos exmilitares la van a estrujar, señora.
src segment: Two ex-military candidates are gonna squeeze you out, ma'am.

ref segment: ¿El Dr. Langley la trató alguna vez?
src segment: Did Dr. Langley ever treat you?

ref segment: Por lo tanto, no la cague. Los fiscales no la van a echar de menos.
src segment: Don't mess up, or the magistrates will have you.

ref segment: Lo siento si pensaste que te la estaba jugando o...
src segment: Look, I'm sorry if you thought that I was playing you or...

ref segment: Comprendo que su tío la ha mantenida bastante ocupada.

ref segment: Entonces la voy a ingresar de inmediato al hospital.

ref segment: Pero, si la ingresamos ahora al hospital, estará entonces segura, y el niño nacerá con seguridad.

src segment: I will take you to them now.

ref segment: Y rogaréis que os salvemos.
src segment: And you will beg us to save you.

ref segment: Vuestra mayor debilidad no puede ser descubierta, pero si la aprovecháis, tampoco os podrá matar.
src segment: Your greatest weakness can't be conquered, but if you embrace it, it can't kill you either.

ref segment: Bueno, puede haber unos cuantos. ¿Queréis que haga que un agente os escolte fuera?
src segment: Well, there might be a few. You want me to have an officer escort you out?

ref segment: Y aunque a algunos os parezca extraño premiar a alguien por el mero hecho de sobrevivir, la historia del congresista Peter MacLeish es cualquier cosa menos una de mera supervivencia.
src segment: And though it might seem odd to some of you to award someone for simply surviving, Congressman Peter MacLeish's story is anything but one of simple survival.

ref segment: Escuchad, Tandy os mintió porque no quería asustaros.
src segment: Listen, Tandy lied to you because he didn't want to scare you.

ref segment: Luego os veo.
src segment: I'm gonna see you later.

ref segment: Eso sí: deberá consultar la bibliografía que os daré.
src segment: That's right. You will have to consult the recommended reading that I'll give you.

ref segment: Eso es lo que se viene, pero primero, dejadme que os explique dónde estamos.
src segment: That is all to come, but first of all, let me talk you through where we are.

ref segment: Dejadme que os cuente el plan.
src segment: Let me talk you through the plan.

ref segment: Eso es lo que os estoy diciendo.
src segment: That's all I'm telling you.

ref segment: También se utilizarán las mejores técnicas de interrogación si alguna vez os atrapan, así que hoy vamos a enseñaros cómo sobrevivir, evadir y resistiros a ellas.
src segment: Enhanced interrogation techniques will also be used on you if you're ever caught, so today we're going to teach you how to survive, evade, and resist them.

ref segment: ¿Qué? ¿No os lo ha dicho?
src segment: What... she never told you about it?

ref segment: ¿Qué recado os trae al bosque?
src segment: What errand brings you to the forest?

ref segment: Sí, pero necesito un cirujano que os asesore oficialmente, y parece que no puedo conseguir uno.
src segment: Yes, but I need a surgeon to officially assess you, and I can't seem to get one.

ref segment: Y mientras otra agencias como el FBI o la ASN harán énfasis en cómo realizar la vigilancia, nosotros en La Granja también os enseñaremos cómo evitarla.
src segment: And while other agencies like the FBI or NSA may emphasize how to run surveillance, we at The Farm also teach you how to avoid it.

ref segment: Lydia dijo que os lo mencionó esta mañana.
src segment: Lydia said she mentioned it to you this morning.

ref segment: Entreno a adjuntos para que os entrenen a vosotros, y la mejor manera que conozco para hacerlo es escuchar vuestra opinión sobre ellos.
src segment: I train attendings to train you, and the best way I know how to do that is to hear from you about them.

ref segment: Creo que antes os he asustado.
src segment: I think I scared you before.

ref segment: Pues espero que os vaya muy bien
src segment: Then I hope it goes well for the two of you.

ref segment: Ahora os veo. Ahora os veo, sí.
src segment: I see you now.

ref segment: -Claro que os estimo
src segment: - Of course I love you.

ref segment: No os expulsaremos
src segment: We won't expel you.

ref segment: ¡os digo que Tampa sería un lugar genial para vivir!
src segment: I am telling you, Tampa would make a great place to live!

ref segment: - Papá os quiere.
src segment: - Daddy loves you.

ref segment: Mi hermano dice que os mate a todos.
src segment: My brother says to kill you all.

ref segment: ¿Pudo haber sido Sandstorm los que os atacaron en el piso franco?
src segment: Wait, could Sandstorm have been the ones that attacked you at the safe house?

ref segment: - Eh, ¿qué os ha retrasado tanto?
src segment: - Hey, what took you so long?

ref segment: Dejad a Rich solo y os dirá cuál usar.
src segment: Leave Rich alone, and he'll tell you which one to use.

ref segment: Apuesto a que no os lo contó... se hizo un raspado con el primero.
src segment: Bet she didn't tell you... she scraped the first one out.

ref segment: No voy a dejar que os pase nada.
src segment: I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.

ref segment: Y es cuando Maya os llamó.
src segment: And that's when Maya called you.

ref segment: Pensaba que os lo había dicho...
src segment: I thought I told you...

ref segment: - vuestra madre también os quiere.
src segment: - your mom loved you too.

ref segment: Solo empatía... por todos los que lucháis contra las interminables guerras civiles en las que este país os ha mantenido cada día, las mismas guerras civiles de las que escapamos de nuestro país.
src segment: Only empathy... for all of you fighting the endless civil wars this country has kept you in every single day, the same civil wars we escaped from back home.

ref segment: - ¿Que os lo hemos fastidiado?
src segment: - We screwed it up for you?

ref segment: - ¡os ha vendido!
src segment: - Sold you out!

ref segment: No os lo voy a dar.
src segment: I ain't just gonna give it to you.

ref segment: O haré que Washington os cuelgue por traición.
src segment: Or else I'll have Washington hang you for treason.

ref segment: ¿Pero os ha hablado también de su padre alcohólico?
src segment: But did he also tell you about his alcoholic father?

ref segment: Un coche os recogerá a las seis de la mañana.
src segment: A car will pick you up at 6:00 a.m.

ref segment: Y solo os pido una cosa, que la recordéis como yo,
src segment: I ask only one thing of you. That you remember her as I do.

ref segment: Que los dioses os acompañen.
src segment: May the Gods be with you.

ref segment: Si la gente de El Toro os vio aquí, asumieron que diríamos algo.
src segment: If El Toro's people saw you here, they would've assumed we said something.

ref segment: Solo os separan unas palabras de vuestra libertad.
src segment: There's just a few words separating you from your freedom.

ref segment: Lo que os estoy a punto de decir no puede salir de esta sala.
src segment: What I'm about to tell you cannot leave this room.

ref segment: Podéis despediros del proyecto de Plan Familiar porque los legisladores de estos distritos os van a hacer un pellizco vulcano de la hostia.
src segment: You can wave bye-bye to the Families First bill because the lawmakers in these districts are going to Vulcan death grip you to fuck.

ref segment: - Permíteme que os compre.
src segment: - Let me acquire you.

ref segment: Chicos, si os pongo como referencias, ¿puedo contar con que diréis cosas buenas de mí?
src segment: Guys, if I list you as references, can I count on you to say nice things about me?

ref segment: Hoy hay 300 escritores de tele que os odian.
src segment: There are 300 TV writers who hate you today.

ref segment: Por fin os tienen.
src segment: They finally got you.

ref segment: Por ello, os lanzo una pregunta:
src segment: So, here's a question for you:

ref segment: Y después estaréis sin un patrón que os proteja.
src segment: And then you will be without a master to protect you.

ref segment: No os ha perdonado por ese asunto con Harry Percy.
src segment: She hasn't forgiven you for that business with Harry Percy.

ref segment: ¿Eso os reconforta?
src segment: Does that comfort you?

ref segment: Apenas os conozco.
src segment: I hardly know you.

ref segment: Dios, pensaba que os iba a abofetear.
src segment: God, I thought she would slap you.

ref segment: Oh, ¿así que Ben os ha contando sobre su cita de anoche? - ¡Entra!
src segment: Oh, so, Ben told you about his date last night? Oh! - Come in!

ref segment: Yo jamás os he comparado.
src segment: I have never compared you two.

ref segment: Cuando os imagino a los dos, me pongo enferma.
src segment: When I picture the two of you, I get sick.

ref segment: Yo os invoco.
src segment: - I call you forth.

ref segment: Creo que ya os he consentido lo suficiente y respondido a vuestras preguntas.
src segment: I think I've indulged you enough here, and answered your questions.

ref segment: Cuando los perros callejeros os atacaron, ¿qué sentisteis?
src segment: When the Mutts attacked you here, how did it feel?

ref segment: La primera vez que os vi a las dos, me... cautivaron.
src segment: When I first saw you two, I was... so taken.

ref segment: ¿Por qué creéis que os he elegido?
src segment: Why do you think I chose you?

ref segment: Por favor... por favor... mis queridas... os he perdonado por todo esto.
src segment: Please... please... my darlings... I forgive you for all of this.

ref segment: Y podríais conseguir una deducción fiscal guay que os podría ayudar con el coste de esa descabellada apestosa construcción...
src segment: And you could get some baller tax breaks that could help you with that mad stank construction cost--

ref segment: Vamos, dejad que os lo enseñe.
src segment: Come on, let me show you around.

ref segment: La ceremonia no se celebrará si hay mentiras que os separan.
src segment: The ceremony won't take if there are lies separating you.

ref segment: La luna llena ya no os controlará.
src segment: The full moon won't control you anymore.

ref segment: Sí, ¿pero eso en que os concierne?
src segment: Yes, but why should that concern you?

ref segment: Nuestros padres os dirán que apañaron nuestro matrimonio cuando nosotros dos eramos cigotos.
src segment: Our parents will tell you that they arranged our marriage when we were both zygotes.

ref segment: ¿Que coño os pasa a todas?
src segment: What the hell is wrong with all of you?

ref segment: El libro de recortes os ha mandado a conseguir todas esas cosas.
src segment: The clipping book sent you all to get these things,

ref segment: Quiere que os diga que se va a Islandia, que va a encontrar a Riley, y que, cuando lo haga, no tardará mucho en encontraros al resto.
src segment: He wants me to tell you that he's going to Iceland, that he's going to find Riley, and once he does, it won't be long until he finds the rest of you.

ref segment: - Sí. Y no quisiéramos que nada os retrasara en vuestros viajes.
src segment: And we wouldn't want anything to keep you from yer travels.

ref segment: Esta familia os ha acogido, os ha dado comida, y refugio.
src segment: This family's taken you in, Given you food, shelter.

ref segment: He tenido una gran idea. ¿Por qué no os compenso por lo de anoche y os invito a todos a desayunar.
src segment: I've got a great idea. Why don't I make up for last night and take you all out for breakfast.

ref segment: Así que, la razón por la que os llamé es porque hay un puesto libre en el ensayo clínico de un nuevo tratamiento.
src segment: So, uh, the reason that I called you in is because a spot has opened up in the clinical trial of a new potential treatment.

ref segment: ¿No os ha dicho nada?
src segment: She didn't talk to you about that?

ref segment: Una carrera, que si puedo decirlo, os mantiene a todos.
src segment: A career, which I might point out, supports all of you.

ref segment: Dios, cuánto os amo.
src segment: Oh, God, how I love you.

ref segment: Os están gastando una broma, señor.
src segment: A joke is being played on you, Sire.

ref segment: Mi compañía no os complace.
src segment: My company does not please you.

ref segment: No necesitáis un lord que os diga cómo trabajar los campos.
src segment: You don't need a lord to tell you how to work the fields.

ref segment: Erais un hombre del cardenal, Rochefort. ¿No os lo contó?
src segment: You were the Cardinal's man, Rochefort. Didn't he tell you?

ref segment: Os acaba de llegar esto.
src segment: This was just delivered for you.

ref segment: - Ya os lo hemos dicho...
src segment: ~ We've told you...

ref segment: Aramis os escoltará.
src segment: Aramis will escort you.

ref segment: Decidle al rey que os hemos tratado justamente.
src segment: Tell the King we treated you fairly.

ref segment: Escuchad a vuestros corazones, ¡no a aquellos que os han corrompido y engañado!
src segment: Listen to your own hearts, not to those who would corrupt and mislead you!

ref segment: Tenéis una hora antes de que la Guardia Roja os pase a espada.
src segment: You have one hour before the Red Guard puts you to the sword.

ref segment: Pero esto no dejará que os contagien sin importar cómo.
src segment: But these will keep you from getting the bug no matter what.

ref segment: Es la Cámara de los horrores de la que os había hablado.
src segment: Here's the Chamber of Horrors I was telling you about.

ref segment: Dudo mucho que estuvierais dejando que cualquier limpiabotas os metiese la maza en la cueva. Así que quiero que vayáis a esos amigos poderosos que os la metieron hasta el fondo para hacerles saber que pueden usar su dinero para que esto se resuelva ya o vosotras y ellos subiréis al estrado para la próxima.
src segment: I doubt you was letting penniless shine boys put the bat in the cave, so I want you to go to these powerful fellas who emptied their bags in you and let them know that they can either use their money

ref segment: Pero nadie os obliga a ver "The Walking Dead". - ¿Está "The Walking Dead" en el término medio?
src segment: But nobody's forcing you to watch "The Walking Dead." Ooh. - Is "The Walking Dead" on the midterm?

ref segment: ¿Qué es lo que os ha pasado?
src segment: What happened to you?

ref segment: - Si no os hubiese encontrado a tiempo.
src segment: ~ If I hadn't found you in time...

ref segment: ¿Os dice algo el nombre de Gerberoy?
src segment: Does the name Gerberoy mean anything to you?

ref segment: Dios os estaba guardando, Vuestra Majestad.
src segment: God was watching over you, Your Majesty.

ref segment: La gente os ama, sire.
src segment: The people love you, sire.

ref segment: "Os pido, hermanos, que reconozcáis aquellos que trabajan entre vosotros y os llevan al Señor y os aconsejan."
src segment: "Now we ask you, brothers, to give recognition to those who labor among you and lead you in the Lord and admonish you."

ref segment: Me imaginé que alguien os habría dicho lo de la casa.
src segment: I figured someone must have tipped you off about the house.

ref segment: No le impedí a Nina que os grabase y debería haberlo hecho.
src segment: I didn't stop Nina from filming you and I should have.

ref segment: "Seguid llamando y las puertas se os abrirán."
src segment: "Keep knocking, and the door will be opened to you." [Knocking on pulpit]

ref segment: Bueno, resulta que yo no estaba tan seguro de mi cosa segura, así que pensé que me pasaría y os haría compañía.
src segment: Well, it turns out I wasn't so sure about my sure thing, so I thought I'd come by and keep you company.

ref segment: Dejad que os presente A Andrew St. John-Paine.
src segment: Let me introduce you to Andrew St. John-Paine.

ref segment: Así que, tengo 47 años, os criado a los dos sin pañales y sin que os mearais encima ¿y ahora queréis intervenir en mi vida?
src segment: So, I'm 47 years old, raised both of you out of diapers and piss pants, and now you intervening in my life?

ref segment: ¿Se os ha ocurrido a alguno que esta podría ser una mala idea - para vuestro grupo?
src segment: Has it occurred to either of you that this could be a really awful idea for your team?

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho, no lo he visto.
src segment: I told you, I haven't seen him.

ref segment: Cuando vi que no estabais aquí, os localicé.
src segment: When you guys weren't here, I tracked you down.

ref segment: Vincent os llevará.
src segment: Vincent will take you.

ref segment: No vamos a dejar que os pase nada, ¿verdad?
src segment: We're not gonna let anything happen to you, will we?

ref segment: Las cuales son dentro de cinco semanas y os puedo garantizar que Vocal Adrenaline y los Warblers están haciendo todo lo que está en su poder para recuperar su gloria perdida.
src segment: Which are five weeks away, but I guarantee you, Vocal Adrenaline and the Warblers are doing everything in their power to regain their former glory.

ref segment: Bueno, os he llamado aquí hoy por Rachel.
src segment: Uh, well, I called you here today because of Rachel.

ref segment: Os dejaré para que os pongáis al día.
src segment: Sure do. I'll leave you two to get reacquainted.

ref segment: Si ella os mata ahí, estaréis perdidos, y si la matáis antes de liberar a Rebekah, Rebekah se habrá ido para siempre.
src segment: If she kills you in there, you will be lost, and if you kill her before you free Rebekah, then Rebekah will be gone forever.

ref segment: Mira, la necesito para debilitar las defensas de Dahlia, un poco de guerra psicológica antes de que os mate a las dos.
src segment: You see, I need her to weaken Dahlia's defenses, bit of psychological warfare before I slaughter the both of you.

ref segment: No fallasteis a esta ciudad, y yo os prometo que no os fallaré dejándola de nuevo.
src segment: You did not fail this city, and I promise I will not fail you by leaving it again.

ref segment: Laurel insistió en que os trajera esta noticia, pero puedo ver que todo lo que hago es dañar vuestro recuerdo de él.
src segment: Laurel insisted that I bring this news to you myself, but I can see all I'm doing is damaging your memory of him.

ref segment: Porque ella te quiere como a una hermana, y os haría mucho daño a las dos.
src segment: Because she loves you like a sister, and it would hurt the both of you too much.

ref segment: Estoy seguro de que Malcolm os dijo... que no tenemos mucho tiempo.
src segment: I'm sure Malcolm told you... We don't have a lot of time.

ref segment: El muerto que os llamó en dos ocasiones justo antes de que le pasó por encima de su recién comprado
src segment: The dead man who called you on two occasions just before you ran him over in your newly purchased

ref segment: Eso es por lo que os llamamos a todas aquí.
src segment: That's why we called you here.

ref segment: Así que nada de lo que os diga...
src segment: So anything that I say to you...

ref segment: Nunca os ha hecho nada malo.
src segment: She never did anything to any one of you.

ref segment: La señorita Acacia os llevó por el mal camino.
src segment: Mistress Acacia led you astray.

ref segment: Hasta que os vi.
src segment: Until I saw you.

ref segment: Bueno, no es necesario, ya que no os recuerdo.
src segment: Well, there's no need, since I have no memory of you.

ref segment: - Por supuesto que os recordaba... ¿cómo podría olvidar la manera en que las malvadas abejas reina me trataron?
src segment: - Of course I remember you... how could I forget the way you evil queen bees treated me?

ref segment: Un cóctel en el bar, una conversación con los ojos, y después los dos os retirábais al baño.
src segment: A cocktail at the bar, a conversation held only with the eyes, and then the two of you retire to the bathroom.

ref segment: Espera, espera. ¿Kimmy os dejó entrar?
src segment: Wait, wait. Kimmy let you in?

ref segment: Desde que era un niño, os he respetado.
src segment: Since I was a boy, I have respected you.

ref segment: Como ya os he dicho, no tengo recuerdos de conoceros entonces.
src segment: As I have already told you, I have no recollection of meeting you then.

ref segment: ¿Creéis que os he ascendido por el encanto de vuestra presencia?
src segment: Do you think I've promoted you for the charm of your presence?

ref segment: Cristo os ayude, Riche, os conozco desde que erais un niño, desesperabais a vuestra familia, erais un jugador y un desperdicio.
src segment: Christ help you, Riche, I have known you since you were a child, you were the despair of your family, you were a gambler and a waster.

ref segment: Os llevaría fuera, os emborracharía hasta que hablarais.
src segment: I would take you out, ply you with alcohol until you opened up.

ref segment: Hoy llevé a Miguel al parque, y os vi juntos.
src segment: I took Miguel to the park today, and I saw you together.

ref segment: Rochefort es un espía español. Os destruirá.
src segment: - Rochefort is a Spanish spy, he will destroy you.

ref segment: Os ha acusado de traición. ¿Por qué no también de asesinato?
src segment: He's accused you of treason. Why not murder as well?

ref segment: Arregló una audiencia privada y os llevará ante él.
src segment: She's arranged a private audience and will lead you to him.

ref segment: Pensaba que os quería antes, pero cuando crees que no volverás a tener algo, simplemente... ya sabes.
src segment: I thought I loved you before, but when you think that you'll never have something again, you just... you know.

ref segment: ¿Qué os trae a esta arte de la ciudad?
src segment: So what brings you to this part of town?

ref segment: Sabía que os debería haber cogido a las dos...
src segment: I knew I shouldn't have gotten the two of you...

ref segment: Nadie os quería aquí.
src segment: Nobody wanted you here.

ref segment: ¿Qué os enseñan en la escuela hoy en día?
src segment: What do they even teach you in school these days?

ref segment: Dejad que os eche un vistazo.
src segment: Let me have a look at you.

ref segment: Vuestra adicción a la tecnología os matará.
src segment: Your addiction to technology is going to kill you.

ref segment: Yo os hubiera llevado a Jaisalmer.
src segment: I would have taken you all the way to Jaisalmer.

ref segment: Que la diosa Kali os proteja.
src segment: May Goddess Kali protect you.

ref segment: Os dos en entregas necesito hoy.
src segment: I need you two on deliveries today.

ref segment: Creo que os entiendo.
src segment: I think I understand you.

ref segment: ¿Sabéis qué? La pena os favorece.
src segment: Misery suits you.

ref segment: A menos que algún inquilino os invite, esto es lo más lejos que podéis llegar.
src segment: Unless a tenant invites you in, This is as far as you go.

ref segment: Conoceréis la verdad y la la verdad os hará libres.
src segment: You will know the truth and the truth will set you free.

ref segment: Conoceréis la verdad y la la verdad os hará libres.
src segment: You will know the truth and the truth will set you free.

ref segment: ¿Ella os ha pedido que vayáis a su casa y que le queméis una alfombra?
src segment: She asked you to go into her house and burn a rug for her?

ref segment: Ese bastardo os ha enviado, ¿verdad?
src segment: That bastard sent you, didn't he?

ref segment: Leonardo da Vinci os salvará.
src segment: Leonardo Da Vinci will save you.

ref segment: ¿Quién os envía?
src segment: (IN ENGLISH) Who sent you, huh?

ref segment: El rey os escuchará.
src segment: The King will listen to you.

ref segment: ¿No os preocupa que pueda haber un traidor entre vuestros propios hombres?
src segment: It doesn't concern you that there is a traitor amongst your own men?

ref segment: Me pidió que os dijese que se reuniría con vos en casa.
src segment: She asked me to tell you she will meet you at home.

ref segment: Él os necesita ahora, mucho más que nunca.
src segment: He needs you now more than ever before.

ref segment: Después naciste tú, mi padre descubrió la verdad y me ordenó que os dejara a ambos.
src segment: After you were born, my father discovered the truth, and ordered me to cast you both aside.

ref segment: Su padre lo iba a desheredar y Belgard dijo que os mataría a los dos él mismo, a menos que os alejáramos.
src segment: His father was going to disinherit him and Belgard said he'll kill you both himself unless we took you away.

ref segment: Un regalo... que os di hace muchos años, cuando fui vuestro tutor en España... el crucifijo enjoyado.
src segment: A gift I gave you many years ago, when I was your tutor in Spain. A jewelled crucifix.

ref segment: ¿Qué pensará vuestro padre si llega a casa y os encuentra así?
src segment: What will your father think if he comes home and finds you like this?

ref segment: Espero que no os haya hecho venir nada serio.
src segment: Uh... Hope that nothing serious brought you down.

ref segment: Espero que puedan mirar en sus corazones y encontrar mi perdón... Sé que os puedo compensar.
src segment: But if you can find it in your hearts to forgive me... ..I know I can make it up to you.

ref segment: Lo mismo pasa con James Wesley, el tipo que dijiste que os contrató para defender a Healy.
src segment: Same goes with, uh, James Wesley, the guy you said hired you to defend Healy.

ref segment: ¿Qué os está pasando?
src segment: What is going on with you two?

ref segment: ¡El personal cegado de la verdad os barrerán al mar!
src segment: The blinding staff of truth will sweep you all into the sea!

ref segment: Sólo espero que a lo mejor podríais decirme quién os contrato
src segment: Just hoping that maybe if you could tell me who hired you,

ref segment: Creí que os había pedido que apagaseis los teléfonos.
src segment: Where there are no weekends off... (cell phone rings) I believe I asked you to turn off your phones.

ref segment: Y os veré en dos semanas.
src segment: And I'll see you in two weeks.

ref segment: Me siento fatal por todo el dinero que os he costado.
src segment: I feel terrible for how much money this is costing you.

ref segment: Yo os conduje por el camino equivocado.
src segment: I led you the wrong way.

ref segment: Escuchadme... tenéis el poder de luchar contra quien os hizo esto, los dos, pero no si os matáis.
src segment: Listen to me... you have the power to fight whoever turned you into this, both of you do, but not if you kill each other.

ref segment: Vuestros padres os criaron bien.
src segment: Your parents, they raised you right.

ref segment: Fuera, ya no os necesito.
src segment: Get out, I don't need you anymore.

ref segment: ¡No es os permite estar aquí!
src segment: I can't allow you in here.

ref segment: Representa a Marlon Brando esta noche y él me ha pedido que os diga que lamentablemente no puede aceptar este generoso premio.
src segment: I'm representing Marlon Brando this evening and he has asked me to tell you that he very regretfully cannot accept this very generous award.

ref segment: Primero, dejad que os aclare cualquier cosa sobre el diafragma herniado del bebé.
src segment: First, let me put you at ease about the baby's herniated diaphragm.

ref segment: La Sra. Willens os dará Ribena caliente cuando terminéis.
src segment: Mrs Willens will have some hot Ribena ready for you when we finish.

ref segment: Cuando este hombre haya terminado, el bretón os pagará.
src segment: By the time this fellow's finished, the Breton'll be paying you.

ref segment: Iré a buscaros tan pronto como os llame de vuelta.
src segment: I'll come and fetch you, as soon as he summons you back.

ref segment: ¿Qué os he dicho de beber vino?
src segment: What have I told you about drinking wine?

ref segment: ¿Por qué os llevo a Westminster?
src segment: Why am I bringing you to Westminster?

ref segment: Me dijeron que Wolsey os tenía porque siempre sabíais todos los cotilleos de Londres.
src segment: I am told that Wolsey kept you because you always knew the London gossip.

ref segment: - No os he visto en mucho tiempo.
src segment: ~ I haven't seen you for a long time.

ref segment: ¡Te llevamos al Infierno donde vuestro maestro Belcebú os espera para cenar!
src segment: We're fetching you to Hell, where our master, Beelzebub, is expecting you to supper!

ref segment: Y si creéis que lady Ana os ama, bueno, no podríais estar más equivocado.
src segment: And if you think Lady Anne loves you - well, you couldn't be more mistaken.

ref segment: Así que si decís una palabra más de las libertades de lady Ana contigo, vendré y os sacaré del agujero... en el que estaréis acojonado y el duque de Norfolk os arrancará las pelotas.
src segment: So if you say one more word about Lady Anne's "freedom" with you, I will come and drag you out of whatever hole you are cowering in and the Duke of Norfolk will bite your bollocks off.

ref segment: Si vienen algunos hombres y os dicen que vayáis con ellos, quiero que vayáis.
src segment: If some men come and tell you to go with them, I want you go with them.

ref segment: He oído que la Santa Mujer, la Barton, os ha visitado.
src segment: I heard the Holy Maid - the Barton girl - has been to visit you.

ref segment: Creo que os llevará a cualquier parte.
src segment: I think it would take you anywhere.

ref segment: O eso es lo que os dice para no heriros.
src segment: Or that's what she's telling you, so you won't get hurt.

ref segment: Pero, ¿no estaríais incluso más heridas si os dijera que siente una conexión con Robert porque es su padre biológico?
src segment: But wouldn't you be even more hurt if she told you she did feel a connection with Robert, because he is her birth father?

ref segment: Todos tenéis jóvenes mentes vibrantes y brillantes, y os animo a usarlas.
src segment: You all have vibrant and brilliant young minds, and I encourage you to use them.

ref segment: ¿Está usted diciendo, "El trabajo os hará libres"?
src segment: Are you saying, "work will set you free"?

ref segment: Si hubiera saber que estabas aquí, yo os lo hubiera conocido en la puerta.
src segment: Had I know you were here, I would have met you at the door.

ref segment: Ya lo veréis, os acabaré desvistiendo.
src segment: You'll see. I'm going to wear you down.

ref segment: Pearl solo os quería porque vuestros padres le pagaban para hacerlo.
src segment: Pearl only loved you because your parents paid her to.

ref segment: Mi gente os tratará como una princesa, princesa.
src segment: My people will treat you like a princess, Princess.

ref segment: Y... tenéis la habilidad de ver lo mejor en las personas incluso después de que os hayan hecho daño.
src segment: And... you have an ability to see the best in people even after they've wronged you.

ref segment: Espero que os complazca lo que os he mostrado.
src segment: I hope you're pleased with what I've shown you.

ref segment: Merecéis estar con alguien que os alce como hombre, alguien que luche con vos, no contra vos.
src segment: You deserve to be with someone who will lift you up as a man, someone who will fight with you, not against you.

ref segment: A pesar de que soy el que os va a matar, ¡no es mi culpa!
src segment: Even though I'm the one who's gonna kill you, it's not my fault!

ref segment: ¡Os lo advertí!
src segment: I warned you!

ref segment: No dejéis que esos bastardos os derriben.
src segment: Don't let the bastards get you down.

ref segment: Yo puedo saltarme las reglas porque vosotros os las saltasteis antes y no os castigué lo suficiente.
src segment: I can break the rules 'cause you guys broke the rules before but I didn't bust you enough.

ref segment: Le diré a uno de nuestros auxiliares que os acompañen hasta allí.
src segment: I'll get one of our flight attendants to escort you on.

ref segment: Maria, ¿dónde os ha llevado Elishia?
src segment: Maria, where is Elishia keeping you all?

ref segment: Ella es la que os ha escondido.
src segment: She's the one that's hiding you.

ref segment: - Y, nosotros os dejaremos a solas.
src segment: - And, uh, we'll leave you two alone.

ref segment: Que os follen.
src segment: Oh, fuck you off.

ref segment: Os dije que podía explicar lo de la pistola.
src segment: Told you I could explain the heater.

ref segment: Por favor, no dejéis el edificio para que trabajéis y, además, no podré hacer que os dejen entrar porque no voy a estar.
src segment: Please don't leave the building so that you work and also I won't be able to sign you back in 'cause I won't be here.

ref segment: Algo que nuestro Sr. Woodhull puede que no os haya dicho todavía.
src segment: Something about our Mr. Woodhull he may not have told you yet.

ref segment: ¡Os juro por Alá que yo no os he traicionado!
src segment: I swear to God, I didn't sell you out.

ref segment: Puedes matarme, pero el que os ha traicionado seguirá por ahí libre.
src segment: You can kill me, but whoever betrayed you will still be out there.

ref segment: Me dijo que os dijera lo mucho que os quería.
src segment: He told me to tell you how much he loves you both.

ref segment: Podemos perdonar Lorenzo como yo os he perdonado.
src segment: We can forgive Lorenzo as I have forgiven you.

ref segment: El mundo os acompaña con oraciones en vuestra inimaginable pérdida.
src segment: The world is praying with you through your unimaginable loss.

ref segment: Pero os quiero asegurar que esto no va a afectar a mis decisiones como subdirectora.
src segment: But I want to assure you that this will not affect my judgment as vice principal.

ref segment: Estamos deseando que os paséis.
src segment: We've been meaning to have you over.

ref segment: Anoche, cuando el CSI Stokes estuvo aquí os habló de la camioneta roja que había sido vista cerca de donde mataron a Brad.
src segment: Last night when CSI Stokes was here, he told you about a red pickup that had been spotted near where Brad was killed.

ref segment: Después de todo lo que os hice pasar la primavera pasada.
src segment: After everything I put you through last spring.

ref segment: Jamás os dije que tuvierais que trabajar solos, pero es lo que cada uno eligió hacer.
src segment: I never told you that you had to work alone, but that's what each of you chose to do.

ref segment: Mira, sé que habéis venido desde Indiana, pero no os quiero en mi vida.
src segment: Look, I know you came here all the way from Indiana, but I don't want you in my life.

ref segment: Un dios no os alimenta u os viste u os protege.
src segment: A god does not feed you or clothe you or protect you.

ref segment: Vuestros padres murieron después de una vida de servidumbre y os dejaron para pagar su deuda.
src segment: Your parents died after a life of servitude and left you to pay off their debt.

ref segment: Me han pedido que os traiga de vuelta a la mesa para comer.
src segment: I've been asked to shepherd you to the dining table for lunch.

ref segment: Quizá haya un modo de que os vuelva a ayudar.
src segment: Maybe there is a way I can help you out again.

ref segment: Y el espíritu os de distancia en el Phantom.
src segment: And I spirit you away in the Phantom.

ref segment: ¿Qué os arranca?
src segment: What ignites you?

ref segment: Odiaría que David pensase que os trato mal.
src segment: I'd hate for David to think I was mistreating you.

ref segment: Bueno, habiendo estado juntos sin descanso virtualmente desde entonces, ¿en qué momento creéis que me he escabullido con boli y papel y planeado un timo completo, y después os lo he ocultado?
src segment: Well, having been together virtually non-stop ever since, at what point do you think I slipped off with pen and paper and planned an entire grift, then withheld it from you?

ref segment: No sé lo que os ha traído aquí hoy, pero si tiene que ver con infidelidad, tendría que decir, como vuestra terapeuta, que os lo toméis bien.
src segment: I don't know what brought you in here today, but if it's about infidelity, I would have to say, as your therapist, to just be cool about it.

ref segment: David Lee os sacó ventaja.
src segment: David Lee took advantage of you.

ref segment: El director Franklin ya me ha dicho que os suspendiera a los tres en cuanto os viera cosa que haré cuando os vea mañana por la mañana.
src segment: Director Franklin already told me to suspend the 3 of you the minute I see you, which I will do when I see you tomorrow morning.

ref segment: No os aconsejo que os acerquéis a ellos.
src segment: I would not advice you to approach them.

ref segment: Supe, sabéis, desde el primer momento que os vi juntos, miré a Robert, y dije: "Se lo va a pedir mientras están aquí".
src segment: I knew, you know, from the very first time I saw the two of you together, I turned to Robert, and I said, "He's going to propose while they're here."

ref segment: Él... estaba preocupado de que os pasara lo mismo que a él.
src segment: He... he... he worried it would do to you what it did to him.

ref segment: Te prometo que os sacaré de ese agujero tan pronto como pueda.
src segment: I promise you, I will get you out of that hole as soon as I can.

ref segment: ¿Quiénes son esa gente que os busca?
src segment: Who are these people looking for you?

ref segment: No parece que os haya ido muy bien hasta ahora.
src segment: It doesn't seem that's really been working out for you so far.

ref segment: La publicidad os protegería.
src segment: The publicity would protect you.

ref segment: No pasa nada, nadie os hará daño.
src segment: All right, no one's gonna hurt you.

ref segment: Quinn y los otros barones, quieren que creáis que son benévolos porque os protegen de los horrores del mundo.
src segment: Quinn and the other barons, they want you to believe they're benevolent because they protect you from the horrors of the world.

ref segment: ¿Y qué os impide marcharos?
src segment: So what's preventing you two from moving out?

ref segment: Volveremos a Oz, y buscaremos la llave del mago imbécil, y os volveremos a juntar.
src segment: We'll go back to Oz, and we'll ... we'll get the key from the wizard of douche, and we'll put you back together.

ref segment: Mi gente os sacará del país.
src segment: My people will get you out of the country.

ref segment: Sí, si sabéis lo que os conviene.
src segment: Yeah, if you know what's good for you.

ref segment: Sé que os he decepcionado.
src segment: Look, I know I have let you all down.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho...
src segment: I already told you...

ref segment: No sé cómo pasó eso pero, sí, sugiere que algo os está buscando.
src segment: I don't know how that happened, but it... yeah, it suggests that something is looking out for you.

ref segment: Nuevos, permitidme que os enseñe los efectos del Sway.
src segment: New guys, allow me to introduce you to the effects of Sway.

ref segment: Dejadme que os enseñe los efectos del Sway.
src segment: Allow me to introduce you to the effects of Sway.

ref segment: Pensabais que os estaba preparando para una gran ascensión.
src segment: You thought I was grooming you for some great ascension.

ref segment: Y luego, cuando perdí la compostura, pensasteis que os había estado engordado como al ganado.
src segment: And then, when I lost my composure, you thought I had been fattening you like cattle.

ref segment: ¿He hecho que os repugne?
src segment: Have I repulsed you?

ref segment: Porque os advierto que si no ponéis de vuestra parte, me vais a tener de enemiga.
src segment: Cos I'm warning you, if you don't make the effort, I'll be your enemy

ref segment: ¡Que os den por el culo!
src segment: Fuck you both!

ref segment: Yo también os quiero mucho.
src segment: I love you both too.

ref segment: Bueno, os veremos en 20 minutos.
src segment: Well, we'll see you in 20 minutes.

ref segment: Simplemente os abriré desde el esófago a la ingle con un cuchillo de pescado.
src segment: I will simply cut you open from gullet to groin with a fish knife.

ref segment: Cuando llegue el momento, a cada uno se os dará una lista de personas... en la corte susceptibles de persuasión.
src segment: When the time is ripe, each of you will be given a list of people at court susceptible to persuasion.

ref segment: Haré algunas averiguaciones si tanto os molesta.
src segment: Well, I shall make some enquiries if it bothers you so.

ref segment: Escuchadme... tenéis el poder de luchar contra quien os hizo esto, los dos, pero no si os matáis.
src segment: Listen to me-- you have the power to fight whoever turned you into this, both of you do, but not if you kill each other.

ref segment: Ya os lo he dicho.
src segment: I've told you.

ref segment: Solo que no creo que mi marido vaya a aprobar el que os esté ayudando.
src segment: I just don't think my husband is going to approve of me helping you.

ref segment: Estoy seguro que encontrareis algo que os siente bien.
src segment: I'm sure you'll find something that suits you.

ref segment: Estaba fuera caminando, y os oí.
src segment: I was out walking, and I heard you two.

ref segment: Este departamento tiene una gran deuda con vosotros por lo que mañana, el alcalde os va a entregar unas medallas de honor.
src segment: This department owes you a debt of gratitude, which is why tomorrow, the mayor is presenting you with medals of honor.

ref segment: Temía que unos animales salvajes os hubieran atacado teniendo en cuenta que anoche no vinisteis.
src segment: I was afraid a pack of wild animals had gotten to you, considering your no-shows last night.

ref segment: Estaos seguros de leer las redacciones de Dave Hickey que os dí para el debate.
src segment: Be sure to read the Dave Hickey essays I gave you for discussion...

ref segment: De alguien que realmente os quería muchísimo.
src segment: By someone who really, really loved you a lot.

ref segment: ¿Alguna vez os ha pasado, como agua... supurando de mis cuencas oculares como un alien excretando fluidos.
src segment: Has that ever happened to you, like... Like water just... Just oozing out of my eyeballs like I'm some alien creature excreting fluids.

ref segment: ¿Todo mientras os envío a los tres allí?
src segment: All while sending the 3 of you back over there? Why don't I reanimate your dead parents for a tea party while I'm at it?

ref segment: Os lo he dicho, lo he superado.
src segment: I told you, I'm over it.

ref segment: Un verdadero político se levantaría aquí y os diría que ellos las odian también, pero los voy a complacer, especialmente cuando eso no es como lo siento.
src segment: A real politician would get up here and tell you they hate them too, but I won't pander, especially when that's not how I feel.

ref segment: Os he dicho que no vi nada ahí.
src segment: I told you I didn't see anything up there.

ref segment: ... Por tanto tiempo como yo os he conocido.
src segment: ...for as long as I've known you.

ref segment: El pescador os bajará por el Sena hasta la costa
src segment: The fisherman will take you down the Seine to the coast,

ref segment: Ninguno de vosotros parece particularmente agradable, pero si tenéis algún amigo o alguien que os ame,
src segment: None of you seem particularly likeable, but if you do have any friends or anyone who does love you,

ref segment: Vuestro padre nunca os mencionó en nuestros tratos.
src segment: Your father never mentioned you to me in all our dealings.

ref segment: ¿Atacamos a la mitad de nuestra población para que os sintáis cómoda?
src segment: Do we attack half our population to put you at ease?

ref segment: Os tomó mucho tiempo.
src segment: Took you long enough.

ref segment: Vale, os veo a los demás después.
src segment: All right, see the rest of you later.

ref segment: ¿Esto es cosa vuestra o alguien os ha presionado?
src segment: Is this your choosing or has someone pressured you?

ref segment: Vale, esto no os matará, pero os provocará náuseas severas y sarpullido.
src segment: Right, it won't kill you, but it will induce severe nausea and a rash.

ref segment: Debe haber sido necesario que los tres os confabulaseis para convencer a M.I.R.A. de que Tom estaba amenazando la misión.
src segment: It would've taken the three of you colluding to convince M.I.R.A. that Tom was threatening the mission.

ref segment: - ¿Supongo que ya no os está confundiendo con Rebecca y Alistair?
src segment: Guess he's not confusing you two for Rebecca and Alistair anymore?

ref segment: De alguien que dice que os conoce.
src segment: Someone who says he knows you.

ref segment: Déjame que os lo resuma, ¿vale?
src segment: Let me bottom line this for you, okay?

ref segment: Desde que esa marca apareció en tu espalda, os ha mantenido separados.
src segment: Ever since that mark first appeared on your back, he's kept the three of you apart.

ref segment: Ese demonio que puso dentro de mí, quería que os llevara allí... con Enos.
src segment: That demon that he put inside me, it wanted me to bring you there... to Enos.

ref segment: Tal vez alguno os lo preguntéis...
src segment: And, uh, some of you might be wondering-

ref segment: Eso es lo que os ha traído mala suerte, no el universo.
src segment: That's what doomed you, not the universe.

ref segment: Os estará esperando un funcionario, Carrasco.
src segment: A civil servant will be waiting for you, Carrasco.

ref segment: - Esa arpía os ha vendido.
src segment: - That harpy sold you out.

ref segment: El Ministerio os tiene engañados, Amelia.
src segment: The Ministry is lying to you all, Amelia.

ref segment: Creí que os sentirías incómodos por lo vuestro.
src segment: Just thought it might be weird for you, because of your history.

ref segment: ¿Dejar que os vayais y que tú sigas siendo yo?
src segment: Just send you on your way, let you keep being me?

ref segment: Simplemente os digo lo que he oído.
src segment: I'm just telling you what i hea.

ref segment: Si es tan fácil, ¿para qué cojones os necesitamos?
src segment: If it's so easy, why the hell do we need you slu?

ref segment: Verás, la Corporación Ferrous ha contactado conmigo para que os localice por un trabajo.
src segment: See, Ferrous Corp. just reached out to me to reach out to you about a job.

ref segment: Era solo cuestión de tiempo de que se os pusiera también en contra.
src segment: It was only a matter of time before she turned on you, too.

ref segment: Bueno, dejad que os saque de ese error, porque estáis a punto de ser "novateadas" con más dureza que un salón de banquetes suburbano durante la temporada del bar mitzvah.
src segment: Well, let me relieve you of that misconception, because you're about to get hazed harder than a suburban banquet hall during bat mitzvah season.

ref segment: Si alguien os tiene como blanco, van a encontraros estéis donde estéis.
src segment: If someone is targeting you, they're gonna find you wherever you are.

ref segment: No si los asesinatos Santo os primeros.
src segment: Not if the ghost murders you first.

ref segment: Y yo os recuerdo que está en juego la vida de un hombre.
src segment: And I remind you the life of a man is at stake.

ref segment: Me dais envidia, sin tener que llevar una doble vida, sin nadie que os pida cuentas, nadie que os espere en casa...
src segment: I'm jealous of you two, not leading a double life, no one asking about your life, no one waiting for you at home...

ref segment: Allí os estará esperando un agente del Ministerio, Ortigosa.
src segment: A Ministry agent will be waiting for you there, Ortigosa.

ref segment: Además, muy bien no os ha tratado, ¿no?
src segment: Besides, she hasn't treated you well, has she?

ref segment: No me importa el castigo que os ponga el Ministerio.
src segment: I don't care what punishment the Ministry gives you.

ref segment: Cuidado, que os ha calado bien hondo ese poeta, ¿eh?
src segment: Careful, that poet's really grown on you, huh?

ref segment: Si lo volvéis a hacer, habréis de venir conmigo para recibir castigo, pues os reclama Satán.
src segment: If you do it again, you will have to come with me to your punishment receive, for Satan claims you.

ref segment: - Alguien que os partirá en dos si...
src segment: - Someone will break you in two if...

ref segment: Sí, el caso es que yo diría también que os he visto antes.
src segment: Yes, in fact, I think I've seen you before.

ref segment: Y parece que vuestra amiga no os olvida.
src segment: And it looks like your friend hasn't forgotten you.

ref segment: Si no lo conseguís, no os librará del verdugo ni el mismísimo rey.
src segment: If you don't succeed, not even the king will save you from the executioner.

ref segment: El caso es que yo diría también que os he visto antes.
src segment: Yes, in fact, I think I've seen you before.

ref segment: Tengo 100 hombres más en los pasillos y tus compañeros están muertos, así que rendíos y se os tratará con honor.
src segment: I have 100 more men in the hallways, and all your comrades are dead, so surrender and we will treat you with honor.

ref segment: No os haré ningún reproche.
src segment: I do not blame you.

ref segment: Es importante que no os vea, por si os recuerda de Barcelona de 1939.
src segment: It's important that he doesn't see you, in case he remembers you from Barcelona in 1939.

ref segment: ¿Quién os ha dado vela en este entierro?
src segment: Who invited you to this party?

ref segment: Pero mentiría si no os dijera que me enseñó lo que es la vida.
src segment: But I would be lying if I did not tell you that he taught me how life is.

ref segment: ¿Quiénes son los hombres y la mujer que os acompañaban?
src segment: Who are the men and the woman - who were with you? - I don't know.

ref segment: Pero vuestras manos suaves os delatan.
src segment: But your soft hands give you away.

ref segment: Pero ¿quién os ha humillado de esta manera?
src segment: But who has humiliated you in this manner?

ref segment: Ella os asfixió.
src segment: She suffocated you.

ref segment: El dinero que os di nunca fue para construir una escuela.
src segment: The money I gave you was never going to build a school.

ref segment: Esperaba que os perdonara.
src segment: I hoped she'd forgive you.

ref segment: María os los cuenta.
src segment: Mary tells you.

ref segment: La cerveza Grand Central os volvió a juntar y esto os volvía a separar de nuevo, ¿verdad?
src segment: Grand Central Beer brought you all back together and it pushed you all apart again, didn't it?

ref segment: Nadie os va a detener, somos los únicos aquí.
src segment: No one's stopping you; we're the only ones here.

ref segment: ¿He hecho que os repugne?
src segment: Have I repulsed you?

ref segment: Vale, os he encontrado.
src segment: Okay. Found you. Oh!

ref segment: Ronaldo os ayudará.
src segment: Ronaldo will help you.

ref segment: Miráos a los dos, delante de ese gran y espantoso matón que os quiere y os protege y que os quiere a salvo en este mundo.
src segment: Ah, look at you two, standing up to the big, scary bully that loves you and protects you and wants you to be safe in this world.

ref segment: Por qué no me dejáis que os ayude a bajar, e iremos a hacer un registro a las cocinas a por un poco de vino caliente con especies.
src segment: Why don't you let me help you down, and we'll go reconnoiter the kitchens for some warm mulled wine.

ref segment: Mirad, sé lo que os ha hecho a todos.
src segment: Look, I know what he has done to you all.

ref segment: Este es Pedro, el hombre del que os hablé.
src segment: This is Peter, the man I told you about.

ref segment: Yo os dejé entrar.
src segment: I let you back in.

ref segment: Vendré y os encontraré más tarde.
src segment: I'll come and find you afterwards.

ref segment: No os merecéis lo que os va a pasar.
src segment: You don't deserve what's going to happen to you.

ref segment: La verdad os hará libres.
src segment: The truth shall set you free.

ref segment: Él os ha traicionado a ambos.
src segment: He had betrayed the both of you.

ref segment: Yo os promoví.
src segment: I promoted you.

ref segment: No, yo tampoco. Nadie os hará daño ni os coartará.
src segment: No, nor do I. No-one hurt you or coerced you.

ref segment: Vamos, Wolsey, ¡te llevamos al infierno donde vuestro maestro Belcebú os espera para cenar!
src segment: Come, Wolsey, we're fetching you to Hell, where our master, Beelzebub, is expecting you to supper!

ref segment: En esta página están las palabras que se dice que os dijo la reina, y que, a su vez, vos pasasteis.
src segment: On this page are words the Queen is said to have spoken to you, and which, in turn, you passed on.

ref segment: Nuestro gobierno me pidió que os liderara.
src segment: I was asked by our government to lead you.

ref segment: Un hombre os ha arrebatado esa libertad.
src segment: One man took that freedom from you.

ref segment: Bueno, Menergy también lo era, pero me echasteis, así que ahora os echo de Los Magos.
src segment: Well, Menergy was our thing too, but you kicked me out of that, so I'm kicking you out of The Wizards.

ref segment: ¿Qué os pasa?
src segment: What is wrong with you two?

ref segment: ¿Os ha enviado para sacarme de aquí?
src segment: She sent you to get me out of here?

ref segment: ¿De verdad creéis que estas cosas os salvarán?
src segment: You really believe this stuff's going to save you? Yes, ma'am.
